;##### Shared 
;##### Events & Messages 
;##### Intros & Extra money for neighbouring factions 
;##### Characters Setup 
;##### Difficulty Settings 
;##### Player Setup 
;##### AI Setup - Money and Troops 
;##### AI Setup - Settlement Expansion 
;##### Faction: Dunland 
;##### Faction: Gundabad 
;##### Faction: Enedwaith 
;##### Faction: Anduin
;##### Faction: High Elves 
;##### Faction: Lorien
;##### Faction: Woodland Realm
;##### Script: Ent Uprising
;##### Script: Rhun Dragon Relic
;##### Script: Dwarven Grudges
;##### Script: Theoden 
;##### Script: Minas Ithil Monitor
;##### Script: Denethor
;##### Script: Aragorn RPG 
;##### Script: Barrow Downs 
;##### Script: Buildings & Settlements 
;##### Script: Corsair Invasions
;##### Script: Dorwinion Choice
;##### Script: Bree Choice 
;##### Script: Ered Luin Ring Choice  
;##### Script: Ered Luin Buzra-dum
;##### Script: Unite the Clans - Rhun 
;##### Script: Unite the Clans - Harad 
;##### Script: Blue Wizards
;##### Script: Khand KP Bonus
;##### Script: Ar-Adunaim KP Bonus
;##### Script: Ent Forest 
;##### Script: Edhellond Reclaiming
;##### Script: Elven Alliance
;##### Script: Gandalf 
;##### Script: Glittering Caves 
;##### Script: Last Stand 
;##### Script: Money 
;##### Script: Moria Reclaiming (M) 
;##### Script: Spoils of War 
;##### Script: UI & Videos 
;##### Script: Weakened Factions
;##### Script: One Ring (M) 
;##### Script: Pacify the Dead
;##### Script: Nazguls 
;##### Script: Hounds of War
;##### Dynamic Garrison 
;##### Battle AI 
;##### Wait Monitors 
;######################################################

script

    restrict_strat_radar false

	
    ;############################### Main ################################
    
    ;   declare_counter turn_timer
    ;
    ;monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
    ;
    ;    if I_CompareCounter turn_timer = 0
    ;        call_object_shortcut - screen_grab
    ;    end_if
    ;    
    ;    inc_counter turn_timer 1
    ;    
    ;    if I_CompareCounter turn_timer >= 10
    ;        set_counter turn_timer 0
    ;    end_if
    ;    
    ;end_monitor

    declare_counter seasons_counter

	;In the following "seasons_counter" value, set it to -1 if you want 1st turn to be winter or to 0 for 1st turn to be summer
    set_counter seasons_counter 0
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        set_event_counter imperial_campaign 1
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
            set_event_counter lumbercamp 1
		end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        set_event_counter is_the_ai 1
        set_event_counter ithil_allied 1
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter AI_growth 1
	end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		log always ----------------------Divide & Conquer v5 - Final Release July 2023 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
        set_event_counter AI_growth 0
        set_event_counter is_the_ai 0
        set_event_counter mordor_rhun_allied 0
        set_event_counter mordor_harad_allied 0
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 0
        set_event_counter dale_allied_dwarves 0
        set_event_counter khand_is_allied 0
    end_monitor
    
    declare_counter first_faction_after_slave		; 1 = is first faction after slave, 0 = not, -1 = set to this in slave's turn

    set_counter first_faction_after_slave -1

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType slave
        if I_CompareCounter first_faction_after_slave == 1
            set_counter first_faction_after_slave 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter first_faction_after_slave == -1
            set_counter first_faction_after_slave 1
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave
        set_counter first_faction_after_slave -1
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart I_CompareCounter first_faction_after_slave == 1
        inc_counter seasons_counter 1
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter = 4
            set_counter seasons_counter 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter = 0
            console_command season winter
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter >= 1
            console_command season summer
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionCultureType northern_european
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily > Allied
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark > Allied
        set_event_counter ithil_allied 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction khand = Allied
        set_event_counter khand_is_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction venice = Allied
        set_event_counter mordor_rhun_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = Allied
        set_event_counter mordor_harad_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled denmark
                console_command diplomatic_stance denmark russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance sicily russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england russia allied
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia allied
            end_if
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
                console_command diplomatic_stance denmark russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance sicily russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england russia allied
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia allied
            end_if
		end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad			
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad poland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad portugal allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad hre allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad timurids war
		end_if
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
        and not I_HotseatEnabled
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway scotland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway mongols allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway ireland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway timurids allied
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 30
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
            console_command diplomatic_stance timurids norway allied
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 25
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
            console_command diplomatic_stance hre timurids war
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction mongols = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_dwarves 1
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction mongols = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
            set_event_counter nd_angmar_dead 1
            terminate_monitor
		end_if	 
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction normans < AtWar
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_normans == 0
        set_event_counter turks_allied_normans 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_normans == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction normans = AtWar
        set_event_counter turks_allied_normans 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction milan < AtWar
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_milan == 0
        set_event_counter turks_allied_milan 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_milan == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction milan = AtWar
        set_event_counter turks_allied_milan 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction timurids < AtWar
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_timurids == 0
        set_event_counter turks_allied_timurids 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_timurids == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction timurids = AtWar
        set_event_counter turks_allied_timurids 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction byzantium < AtWar
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_byzantium == 0
        set_event_counter turks_allied_byzantium 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_byzantium == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction byzantium = AtWar
        set_event_counter turks_allied_byzantium 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction scotland < AtWar
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_scotland == 0
        set_event_counter turks_allied_scotland 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_scotland == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction scotland = AtWar
        set_event_counter turks_allied_scotland 0
    end_monitor

    ;############################## Shared ###############################

    ;##### Tile seen
    declare_counter tileseen_blocked

    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd
        set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Temporary Spotter's Test (WIP)

    declare_counter umbar_invasions_count
    declare_counter crypts_spawns
    declare_counter gor_spawns
    declare_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion
    declare_counter sieges_testing

    monitor_event MultiTurnMove I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
        and HighestAttSharedChar Unorthodoxy named_character = 1
        set_counter sieges_testing 0
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count = -1
            and I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
            and I_CompareCounter gor_spawns = -1
            and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;######################### Events & Messages #########################

	declare_counter faction_ID_sicily
    declare_counter faction_ID_denmark
    declare_counter faction_ID_milan
    declare_counter faction_ID_normans
    declare_counter faction_ID_turks
    declare_counter faction_ID_scotland
    declare_counter faction_ID_timurids
    declare_counter faction_ID_byzantium
    declare_counter faction_ID_moors
    declare_counter faction_ID_hungary
    declare_counter faction_ID_norway
    declare_counter faction_ID_saxons
    declare_counter faction_ID_ireland
    declare_counter faction_ID_mongols
    declare_counter faction_ID_teutonic_order
    declare_counter faction_ID_aztecs
    declare_counter faction_ID_france
    declare_counter faction_ID_england
    declare_counter faction_ID_poland
    declare_counter faction_ID_hre
    declare_counter faction_ID_portugal
    declare_counter faction_ID_venice
    declare_counter faction_ID_gundabad
    declare_counter faction_ID_spain
    declare_counter faction_ID_khand
    declare_counter faction_ID_russia
    declare_counter faction_ID_papal_states
    declare_counter faction_ID_slave
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        
        set_counter faction_ID_sicily 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_denmark 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_milan 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_normans 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_turks 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_scotland 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_timurids 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_byzantium 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_moors 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_hungary 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_norway 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_saxons 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_ireland 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_mongols 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_teutonic_order 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_aztecs 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_france 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_england 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_poland 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_hre 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_portugal 0	
        set_counter faction_ID_venice 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_gundabad 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_spain 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_khand 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_russia 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_papal_states 0		
        set_counter faction_ID_slave 0

        set_event_counter sicily_turn 0
        set_event_counter denmark_turn 0
        set_event_counter milan_turn 0
        set_event_counter normans_turn 0
        set_event_counter turks_turn 0
        set_event_counter scotland_turn 0
        set_event_counter timurids_turn 0
        set_event_counter byzantium_turn 0
        set_event_counter moors_turn 0
        set_event_counter hungary_turn 0
        set_event_counter norway_turn 0
        set_event_counter saxons_turn 0
        set_event_counter ireland_turn 0
        set_event_counter mongols_turn 0
        set_event_counter teutonic_order_turn 0
        set_event_counter aztecs_turn 0
        set_event_counter france_turn 0
        set_event_counter england_turn 0
        set_event_counter poland_turn 0
        set_event_counter hre_turn 0
        set_event_counter portugal_turn 0
        set_event_counter venice_turn 0
        set_event_counter gundabad_turn 0
        set_event_counter spain_turn 0
        set_event_counter khand_turn 0
        set_event_counter russia_turn 0
        set_event_counter papal_states_turn 0
        set_event_counter slave_turn 0
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily ;Gondor
        log always -----------------------------------Gondor Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_sicily 1								
        set_event_counter sicily_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType denmark ;Dol Amroth
        log always -----------------------------------Dol Amroth Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_denmark 1
        set_event_counter denmark_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan ;Rohan
        log always -----------------------------------Rohan Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_milan 1
        set_event_counter milan_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType normans ;Bree
        log always -----------------------------------Bree Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_normans 1
        set_event_counter normans_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks ;Northern Dúnedain
        log always -----------------------------------Northern Dúnedain Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_turks 1
        set_event_counter turks_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland ;Dale
        log always -----------------------------------Dale Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_scotland 1
        set_event_counter scotland_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType timurids ;Anduin Vale
        log always -----------------------------------Anduin Vale Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_timurids 1
        set_event_counter timurids_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium ;Dorwinion
        log always -----------------------------------Dorwinion Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_byzantium 1
        set_event_counter byzantium_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType moors ;Erebor
        log always -----------------------------------Erebor Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_moors 1
        set_event_counter moors_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType hungary ;Ered Luin
        log always -----------------------------------Ered Luin Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_hungary 1
        set_event_counter hungary_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType norway ;Khazad-dûm
        log always -----------------------------------Khazad-dûm Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_norway 1
        set_event_counter norway_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType saxons ;High Elves
        log always -----------------------------------High Elves Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_saxons 1
        set_event_counter saxons_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType ireland ;Lothlórien
        log always -----------------------------------Lothlórien Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_ireland 1
        set_event_counter ireland_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType mongols ;Woodland Realm
        log always -----------------------------------Woodland Realm Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_mongols 1
        set_event_counter mongols_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order ;Enedwaith
        log always -----------------------------------Enedwaith Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_teutonic_order 1
        set_event_counter teutonic_order_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs ;Dunland
        log always -----------------------------------Dunland Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_aztecs 1
        set_event_counter aztecs_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType france ;Isengard
        log always -----------------------------------Isengard Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_france 1
        set_event_counter france_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england ;Mordor
        log always -----------------------------------Mordor Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_england 1
        set_event_counter england_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType poland ;Dol Guldur
        log always -----------------------------------Dol Guldur Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_poland 1
        set_event_counter poland_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType hre ;Goblins of Moria
        log always -----------------------------------Goblins of Moria Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_hre 1
        set_event_counter hre_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType portugal ;Angmar
        log always -----------------------------------Angmar Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_portugal 1
        set_event_counter portugal_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType venice ;Rhun 
        log always -----------------------------------Rhun Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_venice 1
        set_event_counter venice_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType gundabad ;Gundabad
        log always -----------------------------------Gundabad Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_gundabad 1
        set_event_counter gundabad_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType spain ;Harad
        log always -----------------------------------Harad Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_spain 1
        set_event_counter spain_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType khand ;Khand
        log always -----------------------------------Khand Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_khand 1
        set_event_counter khand_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType russia ;Ar-Adunaim 
        log always -----------------------------------Ar-Adunaim  Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_russia 1
        set_event_counter russia_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states ;Sauron
        log always -----------------------------------Sauron Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_papal_states 1
        set_event_counter papal_states_turn 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave ;Rebels
        log always -----------------------------------Rebels Turn-------------------------------
        set_counter faction_ID_slave 1
        set_event_counter slave_turn 1
        set_event_counter sicily_turn 1
        set_event_counter denmark_turn 1
        set_event_counter milan_turn 1
        set_event_counter normans_turn 1
        set_event_counter turks_turn 1
        set_event_counter scotland_turn 1
        set_event_counter timurids_turn 1
        set_event_counter byzantium_turn 1
        set_event_counter moors_turn 1
        set_event_counter hungary_turn 1
        set_event_counter norway_turn 1
        set_event_counter saxons_turn 1
        set_event_counter ireland_turn 1
        set_event_counter mongols_turn 1
        set_event_counter teutonic_order_turn 1
        set_event_counter aztecs_turn 1
        set_event_counter france_turn 1
        set_event_counter england_turn 1
        set_event_counter poland_turn 1
        set_event_counter hre_turn 1
        set_event_counter portugal_turn 1
        set_event_counter venice_turn 1
        set_event_counter gundabad_turn 1
        set_event_counter spain_turn 1
        set_event_counter khand_turn 1
        set_event_counter russia_turn 1
        set_event_counter papal_states_turn 1
        set_event_counter slave_turn 1
    end_monitor
	
	;;;;this is the actual faction overview script

	monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed mission_button
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_sicily == 1
            historic_event faction_info_gondor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_denmark == 1
            historic_event faction_info_da
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_milan == 1
            historic_event faction_info_rohan
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_normans == 1
            historic_event faction_info_bree
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_turks == 1
            historic_event faction_info_nd
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_start > 0
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_start
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_letter > 0
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_letter
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_gollum > 0
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_gollum
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_back > 0
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_back
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_anduril > 0
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_anduril
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_initial > 0
				if I_EventCounter nd_choose_rk = 1
					historic_event aragorn_army_dead_initial factions { turks, }
				end_if 
				
				if I_EventCounter nd_choose_arnor = 1
					historic_event aragorn_army_dead_initialalt factions { turks, }
				end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter army_dead_last > 0
				if I_EventCounter nd_choose_rk = 1
					historic_event aragorn_army_dead_middle factions { turks, }
				end_if 
				
				if I_EventCounter nd_choose_arnor = 1
					historic_event aragorn_army_dead_middlealt factions { turks, }
				end_if 
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_scotland == 1
            historic_event faction_info_dale
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_timurids == 1
            historic_event faction_info_anduin
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_byzantium == 1
            historic_event faction_info_dorwinion
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_moors == 1
            historic_event faction_info_erebor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_hungary == 1
            historic_event faction_info_el
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_norway == 1
            historic_event faction_info_kd
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_saxons == 1
            historic_event faction_info_he
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_ireland == 1
            historic_event faction_info_lorien
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_mongols == 1
            historic_event faction_info_wr
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_teutonic_order == 1
            historic_event faction_info_enedwaith
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_aztecs == 1
            historic_event faction_info_dunland
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_france == 1
            historic_event faction_info_isengard
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_england == 1
            historic_event faction_info_mordor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_poland == 1
            historic_event faction_info_dg
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_hre == 1
            historic_event faction_info_moria
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_portugal == 1
            historic_event faction_info_angmar
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_venice == 1
            historic_event faction_info_rhun
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_gundabad == 1
            historic_event faction_info_gundabad
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_spain == 1
            historic_event faction_info_harad
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_khand == 1
            historic_event faction_info_khand
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter faction_ID_russia == 1
            historic_event faction_info_aa
        end_if
    end_monitor

	;######## Boromirs epic speech ##########
	monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName East_Osgiliath
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Osgiliath = sicily
        and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
            historic_event boromir_speech event/boromir_speech.bik factions { sicily, }
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Osgiliath = turks
        and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            historic_event boromir_speech event/boromir_speech.bik factions { turks, }
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

                reveal_tile 328, 219
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                set_counter sicily_lost_westernosgiliath 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
            if I_SettlementOwner Gobel_Ancalimon = spain
                if I_CompareCounter spain_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	harad_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	325, 121
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 325, 121
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter spain_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Gobel_Ancalimon
                    and I_CompareCounter spain_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	harad_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	325, 121
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 324, 120
                    reveal_tile 324, 121
                    reveal_tile 324, 122
                    reveal_tile 325, 120
                    reveal_tile 325, 121
                    reveal_tile 325, 122
                    reveal_tile 326, 120
                    reveal_tile 326, 121
                    reveal_tile 326, 122
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter spain_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Gobel_Ancalimon
                    set_counter spain_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Gobel_Ancalimon = spain
                and I_CompareCounter spain_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	harad_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	325, 121
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 325, 121
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter spain_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
            if I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
                if I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	enedwaith_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	175, 284
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 175, 284
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter teutonic_order_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Talsir
                    and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	enedwaith_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	175, 284
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 174, 283
                    reveal_tile 174, 284
                    reveal_tile 174, 285
                    reveal_tile 175, 283
                    reveal_tile 175, 284
                    reveal_tile 175, 285
                    reveal_tile 176, 283
                    reveal_tile 176, 284
                    reveal_tile 176, 285
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter teutonic_order_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Talsir
                    set_counter teutonic_order_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
                and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	enedwaith_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	175, 284
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 175, 284
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter teutonic_order_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
            if I_SettlementOwner Lower_Anduin_Vale = timurids
                if I_CompareCounter timurids_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	anduin_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	289, 387
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 289, 387
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter timurids_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Lower_Anduin_Vale
                    and I_CompareCounter timurids_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	anduin_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	289, 387
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 288, 386
                    reveal_tile 288, 387
                    reveal_tile 288, 388
                    reveal_tile 289, 386
                    reveal_tile 289, 387
                    reveal_tile 289, 388
                    reveal_tile 290, 386
                    reveal_tile 290, 387
                    reveal_tile 290, 388
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter timurids_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Lower_Anduin_Vale
                    set_counter timurids_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Lower_Anduin_Vale = timurids
                and I_CompareCounter timurids_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	anduin_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	289, 387
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 289, 387
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter timurids_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            if I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                if I_CompareCounter turks_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	dunedain_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	216, 358
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 216, 358
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter turks_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Angle
                    and I_CompareCounter turks_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	dunedain_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	216, 358
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 215, 357
                    reveal_tile 215, 358
                    reveal_tile 215, 359
                    reveal_tile 216, 357
                    reveal_tile 216, 358
                    reveal_tile 216, 359
                    reveal_tile 217, 357
                    reveal_tile 217, 358
                    reveal_tile 217, 359
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter turks_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Angle
                    set_counter turks_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                and I_CompareCounter turks_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	dunedain_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	216, 358
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 216, 358
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter turks_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            if I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = turks
                if I_CompareCounter turks_lost_fornost = 1
                    reveal_tile 159, 406
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter turks_lost_fornost 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Arthedain
                    and I_CompareCounter turks_sieged_fornost = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	dunedain_fornost_siege
                        date		0
                        position	159, 406
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 158, 405
                    reveal_tile 158, 406
                    reveal_tile 158, 407
                    reveal_tile 159, 405
                    reveal_tile 159, 406
                    reveal_tile 159, 407
                    reveal_tile 160, 405
                    reveal_tile 160, 406
                    reveal_tile 160, 407
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter turks_sieged_fornost 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Arthedain
                    set_counter turks_sieged_fornost 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = turks
                and I_CompareCounter turks_lost_fornost = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	dunedain_fornost_lost
                    date		0
                    position	159, 406
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 159, 406
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter turks_lost_fornost 1
            end_if
        end_if		
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
            if I_SettlementOwner Mistrand = venice
                if I_CompareCounter venice_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	rhun_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	466, 301
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 466, 301
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter venice_lost_capital 0
                end_if

                    and I_CompareCounter venice_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	rhun_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	466, 301
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 465, 300
                    reveal_tile 465, 301
                    reveal_tile 465, 302
                    reveal_tile 466, 300
                    reveal_tile 466, 301
                    reveal_tile 466, 302
                    reveal_tile 467, 300
                    reveal_tile 467, 301
                    reveal_tile 467, 302
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter venice_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Mistrand
                    set_counter venice_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Mistrand = venice
                and I_CompareCounter venice_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	rhun_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	466, 301
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 466, 301
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter venice_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;##### Intros & Extra money for neighbouring factions

    ;##### Leaders

        and IsFactionAIControlled
        historic_event aztecs_king_event
    end_monitor

        and IsFactionAIControlled

    ;##### Mazarbul Book

    set_event_counter mazarbul_book_unlocked 0

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName East_Moria
        and TargetFactionType norway
        and CultureType eastern_european
        and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists mazarbul_book
        set_event_counter mazarbul_book_unlocked 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Power

    declare_counter ents_power
    declare_counter ents_diminishes
    declare_counter france_power
    declare_counter france_diminishes
    declare_counter gundabad_power
    declare_counter gundabad_diminishes
    declare_counter poland_power
    declare_counter poland_diminishes
    declare_counter aztecs_power
    declare_counter aztecs_diminishes
    declare_counter byzantium_power
    declare_counter byzantium_diminishes
    declare_counter denmark_power
    declare_counter denmark_diminishes
    declare_counter england_power
    declare_counter england_diminishes
    declare_counter hre_power
    declare_counter hre_diminishes
    declare_counter hungary_power
    declare_counter hungary_diminishes
    declare_counter ireland_power
    declare_counter ireland_diminishes
    declare_counter khand_power
    declare_counter khand_diminishes
    declare_counter milan_power
    declare_counter milan_diminishes
    declare_counter mongols_power
    declare_counter mongols_diminishes
    declare_counter moors_power
    declare_counter moors_diminishes
    declare_counter normans_power
    declare_counter normans_diminishes
    declare_counter norway_power
    declare_counter norway_diminishes
    declare_counter portugal_power
    declare_counter portugal_diminishes
    declare_counter russia_power
    declare_counter russia_diminishes
    declare_counter saxons_power
    declare_counter saxons_diminishes
    declare_counter scotland_power
    declare_counter scotland_diminishes
    declare_counter sicily_power
    declare_counter sicily_diminishes
    declare_counter spain_power
    declare_counter spain_diminishes
    declare_counter teutonic_order_power
    declare_counter teutonic_order_diminishes
    declare_counter timurids_power
    declare_counter timurids_diminishes
    declare_counter turks_power
    declare_counter turks_diminishes
    declare_counter venice_power
    declare_counter venice_diminishes

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        ;if not I_LocalFaction aztecs
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs < 2
            and I_CompareCounter aztecs_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dunlending_diminish
            set_counter aztecs_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter aztecs_power = 0
            historic_event dunlending_expand
            set_counter aztecs_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction byzantium
        if I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium < 3
            and I_CompareCounter byzantium_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dorwinion_diminish
            set_counter byzantium_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter byzantium_power = 0
            historic_event dorwinion_expand
            set_counter byzantium_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction denmark
        if I_NumberOfSettlements denmark < 2
            and I_CompareCounter denmark_diminishes = 0
            and I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
            historic_event amroth_diminish
            set_counter denmark_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements denmark >= 8
            and I_CompareCounter denmark_power = 0
            historic_event amroth_expand
            set_counter denmark_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction england
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england < 5
            and I_CompareCounter england_diminishes = 0
            historic_event mordor_diminish
            set_counter england_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england >= 20
            and I_CompareCounter england_power = 0
            historic_event mordor_expand
            set_counter england_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction france
        if I_NumberOfSettlements france < 1
            and I_CompareCounter france_diminishes = 0
            historic_event isengard_diminish
            set_counter france_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements france >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter france_power = 0
            historic_event isengard_expand
            set_counter france_power 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements gundabad < 1
            and I_CompareCounter gundabad_diminishes = 0
            historic_event gundabad_diminish
            set_counter gundabad_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements gundabad >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter gundabad_power = 0
            historic_event gundabad_expand
            set_counter gundabad_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction hre
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hre < 2
            and I_CompareCounter hre_diminishes = 0
            historic_event orcs_diminish
            set_counter hre_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hre >= 11
            and I_CompareCounter hre_power = 0
            historic_event orcs_expand
            set_counter hre_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction hungary
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hungary < 3
            and I_CompareCounter hungary_diminishes = 0
            historic_event bluedwarves_diminish
            set_counter hungary_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hungary >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter hungary_power = 0
            historic_event bluedwarves_expand
            set_counter hungary_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction ireland
        if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland < 2
            and I_CompareCounter ireland_diminishes = 0
            and I_EventCounter elven_union = 0
            historic_event galadhrim_diminish
            set_counter ireland_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter ireland_power = 0
            and I_EventCounter elven_union = 0
            historic_event galadhrim_expand
            set_counter ireland_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction khand
        if I_NumberOfSettlements khand < 4
            and I_CompareCounter khand_diminishes = 0
            and I_EventCounter khand_horde = 0
            historic_event khand_diminish
            set_counter khand_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements khand >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter khand_power = 0
            historic_event khand_expand
            set_counter khand_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction milan
        if I_NumberOfSettlements milan < 4
            and I_CompareCounter milan_diminishes = 0
            historic_event rohan_diminish
            set_counter milan_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements milan >= 14
            and I_CompareCounter milan_power = 0
            historic_event rohan_expand
            set_counter milan_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction mongols
        if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols < 2
            and I_CompareCounter mongols_diminishes = 0
            and I_EventCounter elven_union = 0
            historic_event thranduil_diminish
            set_counter mongols_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter mongols_power = 0
            and I_EventCounter elven_union = 0
            historic_event thranduil_expand
            set_counter mongols_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction moors
        if I_NumberOfSettlements moors < 2
            and I_CompareCounter moors_diminishes = 0
            historic_event erebor_diminish
            set_counter moors_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements moors >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter moors_power = 0
            historic_event erebor_expand
            set_counter moors_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction normans
        if I_NumberOfSettlements normans < 4
            and I_CompareCounter normans_diminishes = 0
            historic_event shire_diminish
            set_counter normans_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements normans >= 11
            and I_CompareCounter normans_power = 0
            historic_event shire_expand
            set_counter normans_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction norway
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
            and I_NumberOfSettlements norway < 1
			and I_CompareCounter norway_diminishes = 0
            historic_event khazad_diminish
            set_counter norway_diminishes 1
        end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
            and I_NumberOfSettlements norway = 1
			and I_CompareCounter norway_diminishes = 0
			and I_CompareCounter khazad_western_cleared = 1	
            historic_event khazad_diminish
            set_counter norway_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements norway >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter norway_power = 0
            historic_event khazad_expand
            set_counter norway_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
            if I_TurnNumber >= 5
                if I_NumberOfSettlements poland < 3
                    and I_CompareCounter poland_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event shadow_diminish
                    set_counter poland_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements poland >= 15
            and I_CompareCounter poland_power = 0
            historic_event shadow_expand
            set_counter poland_power 1
        end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction portugal
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal < 3
            and I_CompareCounter portugal_diminishes = 0
            historic_event angmar_diminish
            set_counter portugal_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal >= 12
            and I_CompareCounter portugal_power = 0
            historic_event angmar_expand
            set_counter portugal_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia < 2
				if I_TurnNumber >= 5
					and I_CompareCounter russia_diminishes = 0
					historic_event umbar_diminish
					set_counter russia_diminishes 1
				end_if
			end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements russia >= 7
			and I_CompareCounter russia_power = 0
			historic_event umbar_expand
			set_counter russia_power 1
		end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction saxons
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons < 3
            and I_CompareCounter saxons_diminishes = 0
            historic_event lindon_diminish
            set_counter saxons_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter saxons_power = 0
            historic_event lindon_expand
            set_counter saxons_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction scotland
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scotland < 4
            and I_CompareCounter scotland_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dale_diminish
            set_counter scotland_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scotland >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter scotland_power = 0
            historic_event dale_expand
            set_counter scotland_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction sicily
        if I_NumberOfSettlements sicily < 10
            and I_CompareCounter sicily_diminishes = 0
            and I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
            historic_event gondor_diminish
            set_counter sicily_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements sicily >= 22
            and I_CompareCounter sicily_power = 0
            historic_event gondor_expand
            set_counter sicily_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
          if I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
            if I_TurnNumber >= 1
                if I_NumberOfSettlements spain < 4
                    and I_CompareCounter spain_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event harad_diminish
                    set_counter spain_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
		  end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements spain >= 12
            and I_CompareCounter spain_power = 0
            historic_event harad_expand
            set_counter spain_power 1
        end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
            if I_TurnNumber >= 5
                if I_NumberOfSettlements teutonic_order < 3
                    and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event enedwaith_diminish
                    set_counter teutonic_order_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements teutonic_order >= 13
            and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_power = 0
            historic_event enedwaith_expand
            set_counter teutonic_order_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction timurids
        if I_NumberOfSettlements timurids < 4
            and I_CompareCounter timurids_diminishes = 0
            historic_event anduin_diminish
            set_counter timurids_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements timurids >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter timurids_power = 0
            historic_event anduin_expand
            set_counter timurids_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements turks < 2
            and I_CompareCounter turks_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dunedain_diminish
            set_counter turks_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements turks >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter turks_power = 0
            and I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
            historic_event dunedain_expand
            set_counter turks_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction venice
            if I_TurnNumber >= 1
                if I_NumberOfSettlements venice < 4
                    and I_CompareCounter venice_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event rhun_diminish
                    set_counter venice_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements venice >= 15
            and I_CompareCounter venice_power = 0
            historic_event rhun_expand
            set_counter venice_power 1
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    ;########################## Characters Setup #########################

    declare_counter keep_ancillary

    monitor_event CharacterSelected not IsFactionHeir
        and HasAncType heir_item
        if I_LocalFaction england
            console_command remove_ancillary this servant_eye
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction ireland
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction mongols
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            console_command remove_ancillary this book_bilbo
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction saxons
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction sicily
            console_command remove_ancillary this writings_isildur
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction spain
            console_command remove_ancillary this spear_fuinur
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction venice
            console_command remove_ancillary this scatha_gold
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction timurids
            console_command remove_ancillary this beorning_heir
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction aztecs
            console_command remove_ancillary this wulf_axe
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction gundabad
            console_command remove_ancillary this mace_angbad
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction portugal
            console_command remove_ancillary this blade_carndum
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction russia
            console_command remove_ancillary this kings_banner
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction poland
            console_command remove_ancillary this relic_sword
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            console_command remove_ancillary this clan_staff
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected IsFactionLeader
        and HasAncType king_special
        if I_LocalFaction france
            set_counter keep_ancillary 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Shire_North = france
                and I_SettlementOwner Shire_West = france
                and I_SettlementOwner Shire_South = france
                set_counter keep_ancillary 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter keep_ancillary = 0
                console_command remove_ancillary this chief_shire
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
            console_command remove_ancillary this king_mountain
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            console_command remove_ancillary this highlord_khazaddum
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;########################## Faction: Gundabad #########################
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
	    if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
		   set_event_counter snaga_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter moria_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter guldur_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter gate_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter mordor_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter isen_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter angmar_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter rhudaur_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter uruk_gundabad 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner High_Pass = gundabad
	        and not I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			and I_EventCounter snaga_gundabad = 0
			historic_event snaga_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter moria_gundabad = 0
			historic_event moria_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter moria_gundabad = 0
			historic_event moria_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter guldur_gundabad = 0
			historic_event guldur_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Udun = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter gate_gundabad = 0
			historic_event gate_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter mordor_gundabad = 0
			historic_event mordor_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter isen_gundabad = 0
			historic_event isen_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter angmar_gundabad = 0
			historic_event angmar_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
            and FactionType gundabad
		    and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction turks = AtWar
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
			and I_EventCounter rhudaur_gundabad = 0
			historic_event rhudaur_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor			
	end_monitor
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
            and FactionType gundabad
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
			and I_EventCounter uruk_gundabad = 0
			and I_EventCounter gate_gundabad = 1
			and I_EventCounter mordor_gundabad = 1
			historic_event uruk_gundabad factions { gundabad, }
			terminate_monitor			
	end_monitor
	
    ;########################## Faction: Dunland #########################
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType aztecs
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			set_event_counter dunland_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter dunland_cities 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter dunland_cities 0
		
		if I_EventCounter dunland_throne = 1
			set_event_counter dunland_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
	end_monitor
	
	;Turn Monitors 
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 35
			set_event_counter dunland_united 1
			set_event_counter dunland_elites 1
			set_event_counter dunland_throne 1
			set_event_counter dunland_traitor 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType Aztecs 
		if I_EventCounter dunland_failure = 1
			set_event_counter dunland_player 0
			set_event_counter dunland_united 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
		if I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
			set_event_counter dunland_player 0
			set_event_counter dunland_united 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType france 
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter dunland_united = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 80
			historic_event dunland_failure factions { aztecs, } 
			set_event_counter dunland_failure 1 
			set_event_counter dunland_traitor 1
			set_event_counter dunland_united 0

				unfreeze_faction_ai france

	end_monitor
	
	;To check whether Dunland has backstabbed Isengard 
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france 
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction aztecs > Allied
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
			destroy_units aztecs Orthanc Guard
			destroy_units aztecs Orthanc Warden
			destroy_units aztecs Berserkers
			destroy_units aztecs Uruk-hai Archers
			destroy_units aztecs Uruk-hai Raiders
			kill_character Yagthak_1 
			kill_character lurtz_1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france 
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction aztecs > Allied
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
		    historic_event dunland_traitor factions { aztecs, }
			unfreeze_faction_ai france
			link_faction_ai france isengard_active
			set_event_counter dunland_traitor 1
			set_event_counter dunland_united 0
			destroy_units aztecs Orthanc Guard
			destroy_units aztecs Orthanc Warden
			destroy_units aztecs Berserkers
			destroy_units aztecs Uruk-hai Archers
			destroy_units aztecs Uruk-hai Raiders
			kill_character Yagthak_1 
			kill_character lurtz_1
			increment_kings_purse aztecs -600
			if I_EventCounter dunland_failure = 0 
				if not I_SettlementOwner North_Khand = aztecs
					spawn_army
						faction france
						character	random_name, named character, age 18, x 239, y 283, family, direction S, label isengard_attackers_fangorn
						traits		UrukHaiRace 1, AIBoost 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Bodyguards		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					end
					if not I_HotseatEnabled
						console_command auto_win attacker
					end_if
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_fangorn, North_Khand, attack
				end_if
				if I_SettlementOwner North_Khand = aztecs
