						unit		Clan Spearmen					exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
						unit 		Snaga Catapult			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0 	
					end
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_3, Helms_Deep, attack
				end_if
				
				if not I_SettlementOwner Gap_of_Rohan = aztecs 
					spawn_army
						faction france
						character	Ugluk, named character, age 20, x 228, y 268, portrait Ugluk, battle_model ugluk, hero_ability URUK_HAI, label isengard_attackers_4, family
						traits		Ugluk 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, UrukHaiRace 1, HeroAbilityUrukHai 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Berserker 2, Bloodthirsty 1, GoodCommander 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
						unit		Berserkers			        exp 2 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1unit		
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					end
					if not I_HotseatEnabled
						console_command auto_win attacker
					end_if
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_4, Gap_of_Rohan, attack
				end_if
				if I_SettlementOwner Gap_of_Rohan = aztecs 
					spawn_army
						faction france
						character	Ugluk, named character, age 20, x 228, y 268, portrait Ugluk, battle_model ugluk, hero_ability URUK_HAI, label isengard_attackers_4, family
						traits		Ugluk 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, UrukHaiRace 1, HeroAbilityUrukHai 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Berserker 2, Bloodthirsty 1, GoodCommander 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
						unit		Berserkers			        exp 2 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1unit		
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit 		Snaga Catapult			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0 						
					end
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_4, Gap_of_Rohan, attack
				end_if			
				
				if not I_SettlementOwner Westfold = aztecs
					spawn_army
						faction france
						character	random_name, named character, age 18, x 240, y 268, family, direction W, label isengard_attackers_5
						traits		UrukHaiRace 1, AIBoost 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Bodyguards		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					end
					if not I_HotseatEnabled
						console_command auto_win attacker
					end_if
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_5, Westfold, attack
				end_if 
				if I_SettlementOwner Westfold = aztecs
					spawn_army
						faction france
						character	random_name, named character, age 18, x 240, y 268, family, direction W, label isengard_attackers_5
						traits		UrukHaiRace 1, AIBoost 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Bodyguards		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Warg Marauders				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Raiders		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Uruk-hai Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
						unit		Dunlending Pikemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0	
						unit 		Snaga Catapult			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0 						
					end
					siege_settlement isengard_attackers_5, Westfold, attack
				end_if 
				terminate_monitor
			end_if 	
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Inital Phase 
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs >= 5
			if I_EventCounter dunlending_chief_1 = 0 
				historic_event dunlending_chief_1 factions { aztecs, }
				spawn_army
					faction aztecs
					character	Taraghlan, named character, age 30, x 216, y 312, portrait Taraghlan, direction S
					traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, Dunlending 1, Wulfguard 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 3, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Isenmach Axemen				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end 
				set_event_counter dunlending_chief_1 1
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs >= 7
			if I_EventCounter dunlending_chief_2 = 0
				historic_event dunlending_chief_2 factions { aztecs, }
				spawn_army
					faction aztecs
					character	Glirhuin, named character, age 45, x 217, y 312, portrait Glirhuin, hero_ability IRON_FIST, direction S
					traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, Dunlending 1, Wulfguard 1, HeroAbilityIronFist 1, GoodAdministrator 6, GoodCommander 3, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Wulfs Pikes				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end 
				set_event_counter dunlending_chief_2 1
			end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs >= 8 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 0
            historic_event dunlending_chief_3 factions { aztecs, }
			spawn_army
				faction aztecs
				character	Lurtz, named character, age 42, x 223, y 277, portrait Lurtz, label lurtz_1, battle_model lurtz, hero_ability URUK_HAI, direction S
				traits		Lurtz_Dunland 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, UrukHaiRace 1, HeroAbilityUrukHai 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, Bloodthirsty 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
				unit		Berserkers              	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				unit		Uruk-hai Archers			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				unit		Uruk-hai Raiders			exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			end 
            console_command give_ancillary lurtz_1 troops_isengard
            console_command give_ancillary lurtz_1 uruk_champion
            console_command give_ancillary lurtz_1 lurtz_bow
            console_command give_ancillary lurtz_1 orc_draught
			set_event_counter dunland_united 1
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter dunlending_chief_2 = 1 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether Dunland has taken Helm's Deep
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs
		and I_SettlementOwner Helms_Deep = aztecs
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 0
		and I_EventCounter dunland_united = 1
            historic_event helm_dunland factions { aztecs, }
			change_settlement_name Helms_Deep Freca
			set_event_counter dunland_elites 1
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
			historic_event helm_dunland_traitor factions { aztecs, }
			change_settlement_name Helms_Deep Freca
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether Dunland has taken Isengard (Traitor)
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs
		and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor 1
		and I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = aztecs
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
            historic_event isen_dunland_traitor factions { aztecs, }
			set_event_counter dunland_elites 1
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
	end_monitor
	
	
	;Monitor for the Wulf's Throne
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Kings_land
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = wulf_hall_edoras
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 0
			historic_event dunland_supreme factions { aztecs, }
			set_event_counter dunland_throne 1
			set_event_counter dunland_cities 1
			if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists freca_crest
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
		end_if 
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs 
        and I_EventCounter dunland_traitor = 1
			historic_event dunland_supreme_traitor factions { aztecs, }
			set_event_counter dunland_throne 1
			set_event_counter dunland_cities 1
			if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists freca_crest
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
		end_if 
		if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists freca_crest 
			historic_event dunland_prince factions { aztecs, }
			console_command create_unit freca1 "Mounted Warband" 1 0 0 0
			send_character_off_map freca1
			spawn_army 
				faction aztecs
				character	Freca, named character, x 250, y 249, label freca1
				unit		Wulfs Champions			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			end
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
    ;######################### Faction: Enedwaith #########################

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			set_event_counter enedwaith_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter enedwaith_cities 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter enedwaith_cities 0
		
		if I_EventCounter enedwaith_new_dawn = 1
			set_event_counter enedwaith_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
	end_monitor
	
    ;Allows the AI to skip the script (And delays certain units unlocking)
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
        
		set_event_counter keefei_reclaimed 1
		set_event_counter faolan_reclaimed 1
		set_event_counter fylani_reclaimed 1
		set_event_counter mordag_reclaimed 1
		set_event_counter bairseach_reclaimed 1
		
		if I_TurnNumber >= 30
			set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 1
			set_event_counter liadan_reclaimed 1
			set_event_counter dubhshith_reclaimed 1
		end_if
		
		if I_TurnNumber >= 65
			set_event_counter enedwaith_new_dawn 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether Enedwaith is united 
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Heorot = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Lond_Angren = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Lone_lands = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner South_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner East_Cardolan = teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner Dunland_Hills = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Duneard = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Dunland = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Suduri = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        historic_event enedwaith_united factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Liadan's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event liadan_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Erunestian, named character, age 19, x 150, y 296, portrait Erunestian, direction S
            traits		MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithLiadan 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1
            unit		Liadan Spearmen			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        set_event_counter liadan_reclaimed 1
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Faolan's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner Heorot = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event faolan_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter faolan_reclaimed 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Melmidoc, named character, age 36, x 184, y 297, portrait Melmidoc, hero_ability IRON_FIST, direction S
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithFaolan 1, HeroAbilityIronFist 1, Scout 3, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1
            unit		Faolan Warriors			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Dubhshith's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner Enedwaith = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event dubhshith_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter dubhshith_reclaimed 1
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Bairseach's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner Lond_Angren = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event bairseach_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, } 
        set_event_counter bairseach_reclaimed 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Ruscion, admiral, age 21, x 147, y 250, direction S
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithAdmiral 1, Sailor 7
            unit		Enedwaith Boat			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Mordag's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event mordag_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter mordag_reclaimed 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Fionghan, named character, age 45, x 168, y 316, portrait Fionghan, hero_ability IRON_FIST, direction S
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithMordag 1, HeroAbilityIronFist 1, Scout 3, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 3, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1
            unit		Mordag Skirmishers			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Keefei's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner South_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event keefei_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter keefei_reclaimed 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Ghan, named character, age 26, x 180, y 255, direction S, portrait Ghan, battle_model ghanburighan
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithDruedain 1, Scout 3, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAmbusher 4, GoodCommander 4, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1
            unit		Druedain Hunters	exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;Moniter for checking whether the Fylani's clanseat has been reclaimed
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and I_SettlementOwner East_Cardolan = teutonic_order
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        historic_event fylani_reclaimed factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter fylani_reclaimed 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Coruion, named character, age 35, x 162, y 325, portrait Coruion, hero_ability IRON_FIST, direction S
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithFylani 1, HeroAbilityIronFist 1, Scout 3, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, GoodCavalryGeneral 2
            unit		War Wagons			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

	;Monitor for the Tír Croícoill
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Tharbad
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = clan_tharbad
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        change_settlement_name Tharbad Athamor
        historic_event enedwaith_new_dawn factions { teutonic_order, }
        set_event_counter enedwaith_new_dawn 1
        set_event_counter enedwaith_cities 1
        spawn_army
            faction teutonic_order
            character	Seitheach, named character, age 17, x 184, y 333, portrait Seitheach, hero_ability IRON_FIST, direction S
            traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, EnedwaithClansman 1, EnedwaithMordag 1, HeroAbilityIronFist 1, GoodCommander 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, PietyStarter 1, LoyaltyStarter 1
            unit		Tir Croicoill Cosantoiri			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        end
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

	;######################### Faction: Anduin #########################

    ; Mountain Trade 
	declare_counter anduin_prosperity 
	set_counter anduin_prosperity 0
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType timurids
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
			set_event_counter anduin_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter anduin_cities 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType timurids
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter anduin_cities 0

		if I_CompareCounter anduin_prosperity >= 100
			historic_event anduin_prosperity factions { timurids, }
			set_event_counter anduin_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = pass_tower 

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 

		if I_CompareCounter anduin_prosperity = 100
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        inc_counter anduin_prosperity 5 
        
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = pass_outpost

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 

		if I_CompareCounter anduin_prosperity = 100
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 

        inc_counter anduin_prosperity 10 

	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = pass_keep 

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
        
		if I_CompareCounter anduin_prosperity = 100
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 

        inc_counter anduin_prosperity 10
        
	end_monitor
		
    ;######################### Faction: High Elves ##########################

    ; Eregion Reclaiming
    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Eregion = saxons
            console_command add_population Imladris, -50
            console_command add_population Eregion, 50
            increment_kings_purse saxons 600
            add_events
                event historic	imladris_claim_eregion
                date		0
                position	214, 331
            end_add_events
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Glorfindel
    declare_counter glorfindel_spawned

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType saxons
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons >= 15
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Glorfindel, named character, age 22, x 245, y 379, direction S, portrait Glorfindel, battle_model glorfin, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label glorfindel_1
                traits		Glorfindel 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseGoldenFlower 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 3, Handsome 3, BattleOfFornost 1, FallOfGondolin 1, KilledBalrog 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Just 1, LivedAges 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, Reincarnated 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Elderinwe Roquen			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            set_counter glorfindel_spawned 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
                snap_strat_camera 245, 379
                historic_event glorfindel factions { saxons, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal <= 2
            and I_CompareCounter glorfindel_spawned = 0
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Glorfindel, named character, age 22, x 245, y 379, direction S, portrait Glorfindel, battle_model glorfin, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label glorfindel_1
                traits		Glorfindel 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseGoldenFlower 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 3, Handsome 3, BattleOfFornost 1, FallOfGondolin 1, KilledBalrog 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Just 1, LivedAges 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, Reincarnated 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Elderinwe Roquen			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            set_counter glorfindel_spawned 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
                snap_strat_camera 245, 379
                historic_event glorfindel factions { saxons, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter glorfindel_spawned = 1
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 troops_helf
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 asfaloth
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 glorfindel_armour
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    ; Dornornoston
    declare_counter dornornoston_spawned

	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = m_gwaith_i_mirdain_guild
        spawn_army
            faction saxons
            character	Dornornoston, named character, age 22, x 214, y 335, direction S, portrait Galdor, battle_model dorn, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label dornornoston_1
            traits		Dornornoston 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseFinarfin 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 2, Handsome 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
            unit		Eregion Smiths			exp 2 armour 10 weapon_lvl 0
        end
        set_counter dornornoston_spawned 1
        snap_strat_camera 214, 335
        historic_event dornornoston factions { saxons, }
        console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 elven_sculptor
        console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 eregion_helmet
        console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 noldor_shield
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    ; The Twins
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType saxons
	    and I_TurnNumber = 15	
	        point_at_strat_position 191, 380	
            snap_strat_camera 191, 380
		    historic_event the_twins_start factions { saxons, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
		
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType saxons	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 15	
	        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile saxons diplomat, 5 191, 380
		    ui_flash_stop
            zoom_strat_camera 203, 385
            campaign_wait 1
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Elladan, named character, age 18, x 223, y 386, portrait Elladan, battle_model twins_elladan, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label elladan_1
                unit		Dunedain Bodyguard 			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Dunedain Scouts 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Elrohir, named character, age 17, x 186, y 393, portrait Elrohir, battle_model twins_elrohir, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label elrohir_1
                unit		Dunedain Bodyguard 			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Dunedain Scouts 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end	
		    historic_event the_twins factions { saxons, }
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor

    ; Elven Barracks rules
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
		   set_event_counter imladris_controlled 1
		   set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
        and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
            set_event_counter imladris_controlled 1
		end_if
	    if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
        and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
            set_event_counter imladris_controlled 0
		end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
        and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
            set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 1
		end_if
	    if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
        and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
            set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 0
		end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
		   set_event_counter jewel_guild_rebuilt 1
		   set_event_counter eregion_reclaimed 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Eregion = saxons
			and I_EventCounter eregion_reclaimed = 0
			historic_event eregion_reclaimed factions { saxons, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = m_gwaith_i_mirdain_guild
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_EventCounter jewel_guild_rebuilt = 0
			historic_event jewel_guild_rebuilt factions { saxons, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_TurnNumber = 0
            destroy_buildings saxons teleri_barracks true
            destroy_buildings saxons teleri_barracks_castle true
            campaign_wait 0.1
            console_command create_building Imladris c_teleri_barracks
            console_command create_building Mithlond teleri_barracks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor	
	
	;######################### Faction: Lorien ##########################
	;Rumil	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType ireland
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 30
		if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = ireland
			spawn_army
				faction ireland
				character	Rumil, named character, age 20, x 269, y 329, direction S, portrait rumil, battle_model haldir, label rumil_1, hero_ability SILVAN
				traits		Rumil 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, HeroAbilitySilvanElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
				unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
			end
			snap_strat_camera 269, 329
			historic_event rumil_promoted factions { ireland, }
			console_command give_ancillary rumil_1 galadhrim_sentinel
			console_command give_ancillary rumil_1 lorien_cloak

			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	    and I_TurnNumber >= 30
		if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland >= 8
			spawn_army

				character	Orophin, named character, age 20, x 272, y 329, direction S, portrait orophin, battle_model haldir, label orophin_1, hero_ability SILVAN

				unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
			end

			console_command give_ancillary orophin_1 lorien_bow

		end_if

	;####### Script: Ent Uprising  ################
	
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and FactionType france
    historic_event fury_of_forest factions { france, }
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	if I_IsFactionAIControlled france
	    terminate_monitor
    end_if
    
	if I_NumberOfSettlements france >= 4
    and I_EventCounter ents_script = 0
        historic_event forest_distraught factions { france, }
        set_event_counter ents_script 1
    end_if
	
	if I_NumberOfSettlements france >= 7
		historic_event ents_march factions { france, }
	    terminate_monitor
    end_if
	
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
	if I_IsFactionAIControlled france
	    terminate_monitor
    end_if
    
	if I_NumberOfSettlements france >= 8
	and I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = france
        disable_cursor
		console_command move_character ents_1 224, 278
        siege_settlement ents_1, Nan_Curunir, attack
        select_ui_element prebattle_fight_button
        simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
        simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
        enable_cursor
	    terminate_monitor
	end_if

end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Nan_Curunir
		campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = slave
		change_settlement_name Nan_Curunir Treegarth
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = slave
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

	;####### Script: Rhun Dragon Relic  ################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_scales = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Esgaroth = venice
				historic_event smaug_scales factions { venice, }
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists smaug_artefact
				historic_event smaug_scales factions { venice, }
				historic_event smaug_jewels factions { venice, }
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_jewels = 0
			and I_SettlementOwner Esgaroth = venice
				historic_event smaug_jewels factions { venice, }
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter scatha_artefact = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Lower_Anduin_Vale = venice
				historic_event scatha_artefact factions { venice, }
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists scatha_artefact
				historic_event scatha_artefact factions { venice, }
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter dragon_egg = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Withered = venice
				historic_event dragon_egg factions { venice, }
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists egg_artefact
				historic_event dragon_egg factions { venice, }
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_scales = 1
			and I_EventCounter smaug_jewels = 1
			and I_EventCounter scatha_artefact = 1
			and I_EventCounter dragon_egg = 1
			historic_event dragon_relic_complete factions { venice, }
			console_command add_money 3000
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			and I_TurnNumber = 2
			disable_cursor
			hide_ui
			zoom_strat_camera 1
			campaign_wait 0.2
			snap_strat_camera 285, 380
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 288, 387
			point_at_settlement Lower_Anduin_Vale
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 338, 409
			point_at_settlement Esgaroth
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 315, 438
			point_at_settlement Withered
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			show_ui
			enable_cursor
			campaign_wait 0.2
            historic_event dragon_relic_hunt factions { venice, }
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

;######## Script: Reclaiming Dwarven Relics  #############
;check the final ered luin ring script for counters, turn numbers

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
			and I_EventCounter luin_ring_06 = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 0
			historic_event dwarven_relic_requisition_start factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

;narsil

	declare_counter narsil_claim_rejected
	set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 0

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter narsil_reclaimed = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
			and I_EventCounter narsil_aragorn_dead = 0
			snap_strat_camera 246, 384 ;Imladris
			historic_event narsil_aragorn_dead factions { hungary, }
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter narsil_aragorn_dead = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
			historic_event narsil_reclaimed factions { hungary, }
			console_command add_money 3000
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 38
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 0
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
				snap_strat_camera 200, 361
				campaign_wait 1
				move_strat_camera 217, 361
				campaign_wait 1
				point_at_settlement Angle
				campaign_wait 1
				ui_flash_stop
				historic_event dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil factions { hungary, }
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 1
				and I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 0
				and I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
				and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
				snap_strat_camera 217, 361
				historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_a factions { hungary, }
				set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 1
				and I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 0
				if not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
					and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
					snap_strat_camera 217, 361
					historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_b factions { hungary, }
					set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
				if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
					snap_strat_camera 217, 361
					historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_c factions { hungary, }
					set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
			end_if
		end_if
    end_monitor

;horn of the mark

	declare_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected
	set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 0

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter eorls_horn_reclaimed = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
			and I_EventCounter eorls_horn_theoden_dead = 0
			snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
			historic_event eorls_horn_theoden_dead factions { hungary, }
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter eorls_horn_theoden_dead = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
			console_command add_money 3000
			historic_event eorls_horn_reclaimed factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 46
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 0
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
				snap_strat_camera 240, 250 ;Edoras
				campaign_wait 1
				move_strat_camera 249, 250
				campaign_wait 1
				point_at_settlement Kings_Land
				campaign_wait 1
				ui_flash_stop
				historic_event dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn factions { hungary, }
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 1
				and I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 0
				and I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = milan
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
				and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
				snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
				historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_a factions { hungary, }
				set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 1
				and I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 0
				if not I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = milan
					and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
					snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
					historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_b factions { hungary, }
					set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
				if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
					snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
					historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_c factions { hungary, }
					set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
			end_if
		end_if
    end_monitor

;Gurthang and Dragon-helm of Dor-lomin

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 52
			and I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			and I_EventCounter tol_morwen_start = 0
            snap_strat_camera 8, 449 ;Tol Fuin until Tol Morwen added
			campaign_wait 1
			move_strat_camera 8, 438
			campaign_wait 1
            point_at_strat_position 8, 438 ;Tol Morwen
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			historic_event tol_morwen_start factions { hungary, }
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter tol_morwen_start = 1
			and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary spy, 6 8, 438 ;Tol Morwen
			and I_EventCounter turins_grave_opened = 0
			historic_event turins_grave_opened
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter turins_grave_opened = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists helm_dorlomin
			historic_event gurthang_reforged factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

;####### Script: Dwarven Grudges ##############################

	declare_counter dwarven_wmoria
	declare_counter dwarven_emoria
	declare_counter dwarven_gundabad
	declare_counter dwarven_dainshalls
	declare_counter dwarven_erebor


    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType moors
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber = 2
			disable_cursor
			hide_ui
			zoom_strat_camera 1
			campaign_wait 0.2
			snap_strat_camera 250, 342
			campaign_wait 1
			move_strat_camera 246, 342
			point_at_settlement East_Moria
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 242, 342
			point_at_settlement West_Moria
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 252, 439
			point_at_settlement Mt_Gundabad 
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 285, 439
			point_at_settlement Grey_Mountains
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 339, 421
			point_at_settlement Erebor
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			show_ui
			enable_cursor
			campaign_wait 0.2
			historic_event dwarven_realms_start factions { moors, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 20
			and I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
			historic_event dwarven_realms_start factions { norway, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
		if not I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
			set_event_counter dwarven_realms_reclaimed 0
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 0
			set_event_counter dwarven_realms_reclaimed 1
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
        if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = moors
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = norway
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = moors
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = norway
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = moors
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = norway
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
        if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = moors
            set_counter dwarven_wmoria 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
            set_counter dwarven_emoria 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = moors
            set_counter dwarven_gundabad 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = moors
            set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
            set_counter dwarven_erebor 0
		end_if
	end_monitor


    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			historic_event dwarven_realms_reclaimed factions { hungary, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType moors
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
		and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
		console_command add_money 4000
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
		and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
		console_command add_money 4000
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor


	;####### Script: Theoden ##############################

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			historic_event theoden_deceived factions { milan, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			console_command give_trait theoden_1 TheodenDeceived 2
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			and I_TurnNumber >= 9
			console_command give_trait theoden_1 TheodenDeceived 2
			console_command character_reset theoden_1
			historic_event theoden_renewed factions { milan, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;####### Script: Minas Ithil Monitor ###################
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Morgul_Vale
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = moon
		
		set_event_counter moon_tower 1
		
        terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	;####### Script: Denethor ##############################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists high_warden
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 BoromirDead 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists warden
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 FaramirDead 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if I_TurnNumber >= 3
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter denethor_mad = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_mad = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 110 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 8
				historic_event denethor_mad factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 110
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 7
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 8
				historic_event denethor_mad factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_descending_madness = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 89 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 7
				historic_event denethor_descending_madness factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 89
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 6
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 7
				historic_event denethor_descending_madness factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sense_doom = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 69 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 6
				historic_event denethor_sense_doom factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 5
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 6
				historic_event denethor_sense_doom factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_progress = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 39 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 5
				historic_event denethor_sauron_progress factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 39
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 4
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 5
				historic_event denethor_sauron_progress factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_plan = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 29 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 4
				historic_event denethor_sauron_plan factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 29
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 3
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 4
				historic_event denethor_sauron_plan factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_defiance = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 19
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 3
				historic_event denethor_sauron_defiance factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 19
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 2
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 3
				historic_event denethor_sauron_defiance factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_contact = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 10 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 2
				historic_event denethor_sauron_contact factions { sicily, }
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 10
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 1
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 2
				historic_event denethor_sauron_contact factions { sicily, }
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 2
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 1
            historic_event denethor_palantir_start factions { sicily, }
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad > 0
			and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
			and I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 Sane 1
			console_command add_money 5000
			historic_event denethor_redeemed factions { sicily, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements england < 1
			and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad > 0
			and I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 Sane 1
			console_command add_money 5000
			historic_event denethor_redeemed factions { sicily, }
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	declare_counter gondor_battle_lost

	monitor_event PostBattle FactionType sicily
		and not I_WonBattle sicily

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_CompareCounter gondor_battle_lost = 0
			set_counter gondor_battle_lost 1
			if I_CompareCounter gondor_battle_lost = 1
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily GondorLostBattle = 0
            console_command give_trait denethor_1 GondorLostBattle 1
			end_if
		end_if
		set_counter gondor_battle_lost 0
	end_monitor
	
	
    ;############################ Aragorn RPG ############################

    
    declare_counter aragorn_rpg_anduril_answer
    
    if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
        set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -1
    end_if

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle <= -1
			set_event_counter army_dead_last 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 7
			set_event_counter army_dead_last 1
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	King_of_the_Dead, named character, age 40, x 208, y 483, portrait KingDead
                traits		LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
			console_command move_character aragorn_1 248, 238
            give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead KingDead 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead Hero 1
			console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead CustomBG 1
			console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead FearGeneral 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead HeroAbilityKingDead 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead BattleFear 5
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead GoodCommander 5
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead GoodAttacker 4
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead Loyal 4
            create_unit King_of_the_Dead, Ents, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            send_character_off_map King_of_the_Dead
            destroy_units turks Ents
            spawn_army
                faction turks
                character	King_of_the_Dead, named character, x 249, y 238, battle_model oathbreakers2, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Dead
                unit		Oathbreakers	exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            
			if I_EventCounter nd_choose_rk = 1
				historic_event aragorn_army_dead_middle factions { turks, }
			end_if 
			
			if I_EventCounter nd_choose_arnor = 1
				historic_event aragorn_army_dead_middlealt factions { turks, }
			end_if 
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 6
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_initial = 0
            
			set_event_counter gandalf_rpg 1
			set_event_counter aragorn_rpg_anduril 0
			if I_EventCounter nd_choose_rk = 1
				historic_event aragorn_army_dead_initial factions { turks, }
			end_if 
			
			if I_EventCounter nd_choose_arnor = 1
				historic_event aragorn_army_dead_initialalt factions { turks, }
				set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_initial 1
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 5
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_anduril = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary aragorn_1 narsil
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 anduril
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_anduril true factions { turks, }
            set_counter aragorn_rpg_anduril_answer 1
			set_event_counter aragorn_rpg_back 0
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 4
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_back = 0
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_back factions { turks, }
			set_event_counter aragorn_rpg_gollum 0
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 3
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_gollum = 0
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 kingsfoil
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_gollum factions { turks, }
			set_event_counter aragorn_rpg_letter 0
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 2
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_letter = 0
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_letter factions { turks, }
			set_event_counter aragorn_rpg_start 0
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 6
            ui_flash_stop
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 5
            snap_strat_camera 166, 380
            point_at_settlement Bree
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_start factions { turks, }
        end_if
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType aragorn_rpg_anduril_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter aragorn_rpg_anduril_answer 0
        set_event_counter nd_choose_rk 1
		historic_event aragorn_rpg_ost_sulrk factions { turks, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType aragorn_rpg_anduril_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter aragorn_rpg_anduril_answer 0
        set_event_counter nd_choose_arnor 1
		historic_event aragorn_rpg_ost_sularnor factions { turks, }
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
    
    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction turks
            if I_CompareCounter aragorn_rpg_anduril_answer == 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event aragorn_rpg_anduril true factions { turks, }
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    declare_counter oathbreaker_timer

    
    ;3 times battle limit for Oathbreakers
    monitor_event PostBattle Trait KingDead > 0
        log always ---------------------oathbreaker monitor---------------------
        inc_counter oathbreaker_timer 1
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event CharacterSelected Trait KingDead > 0
        if I_CompareCounter oathbreaker_timer = 3
            if I_CharacterExists King_of_the_Dead
                kill_character King_of_the_Dead
            end_if
            historic_event aragorn_army_dead_final factions { turks, }
            destroy_units turks Oathbreakers
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType turks
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if I_CompareCounter oathbreaker_timer = 3
            if I_CharacterExists King_of_the_Dead
                kill_character King_of_the_Dead
            end_if
            historic_event aragorn_army_dead_final factions { turks, }
            destroy_units turks Oathbreakers
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	    and not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
			and I_EventCounter arnor_restored = 1 
				historic_event rhudaur_dunedain factions { turks, }
				terminate_monitor
		end_if	 
		
		if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
			and I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1 
				historic_event rhudaur_dunedain factions { turks, }
				terminate_monitor
		end_if	 
    end_monitor
    
    ;################## Northern Dunedain Reunited Kingdom/Arnor ###################
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType turks
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			set_event_counter nd_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter nd_cities 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter nd_cities 0
		
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1
			set_event_counter nd_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
		if I_EventCounter arnor_restored = 1
			set_event_counter nd_cities 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if 
		
	end_monitor
	
	
	declare_counter minas_tirith_check
	;BoH Validation Script 
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
			set_event_counter ND_BOH 1
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1
			set_event_counter ND_BOH 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType turks
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
			set_event_counter ND_BOH 0
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1
			set_event_counter ND_BOH 0
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;Arnor Failsafe Script (Aragon's Death)
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists evenstar 
			historic_event aragorn_death factions { turks,}
			 set_event_counter nd_choose_rk 0
			 set_event_counter nd_choose_arnor 1
			 set_event_counter aragorn_death 1
			 set_event_counter gandalf_rpg 1
			 terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter arnor_restored = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;Arnor
	
	monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Lake_Evendim
	and SettlementBuildingExists house_of_kings
	and I_SettlementOwner Lake_Evendim = turks
		set_event_counter house_of_kings_finished 1
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction normans = Allied
	
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        
		if I_EventCounter house_of_kings_finished = 1
			and I_SettlementOwner Bree = normans
			and I_EventCounter nd_choose_arnor = 1

			if I_EventCounter aragorn_death = 0
				historic_event arnor_restored factions { turks,}
				change_battle_model turks leader aragorn_arnor
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter aragorn_death = 1
				historic_event arnor_restoredalt factions { turks,}
			end_if
			set_event_counter arnor_restored 1
			set_event_counter army_dead_last 0
            set_faction_banner
                faction turks
                banner scripts
			end_set_faction_banner
            give_everything_to_faction normans turks false
            if I_CharacterExists barliman_1
                kill_character barliman_1
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Barliman, named character, age 50, x 166, y 380, portrait Barliman, hero_ability SHIELD, battle_model barliman, label barliman_2
                    traits		Hero 1, MiddleManRace 1, Breelander 1, HeroAbilityShield 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, GoodAdministrator 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodCommander 2, GoodTrader 2, Just 2, PoliticsSkill 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategyChivalryGood 2
                    unit		Gate Keepers					exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                end
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists breeheir
                kill_character breeheir
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	Andy, named character, age 25, x 166, y 376, portrait Andrew, label breeheir_2
                    traits		MiddleManRace 1, Breelander 1, Brave 2, RenownLegacy 2, GoodCommander 2, GoodTrader 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 2, PietyStarter 1

        if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
            terminate_monitor
        end_if

            set_counter minas_tirith_check 0
        end_if

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
            set_event_counter nd_rk 0
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 1
            set_event_counter nd_rk 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor 
    
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType turks
        set_event_counter nd_rk 1
        set_counter minas_tirith_check 1
    end_monitor 
    
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily = Allied
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark = Allied
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    
		;if I_TurnNumber = 1
		if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 8
        and I_CompareCounter minas_tirith_check == 1
        and I_EventCounter nd_choose_rk = 1
            historic_event reunited_kingdom_event factions { turks,}
			set_event_counter army_dead_last 0
            set_event_counter reunited_kingdom 1
            if I_SettlementOwner East_Osgiliath = sicily
            and I_EventCounter osgiliath_east_rebuild = 0

            and I_EventCounter osgiliath_east_rebuild = 0

            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner East_Osgiliath = russia

                faction turks
                banner united

            give_everything_to_faction denmark turks false

            add_money turks 12000

            set_faction_standing turks spain -1.00
            set_faction_standing spain turks -1.00

            set_faction_standing venice turks -1.00

            set_faction_standing france turks -1.00

            set_faction_standing russia turks -1.00

            set_faction_standing portugal turks -1.00

            set_faction_standing hre turks -1.00
            if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1

                set_faction_standing turks khand -1.00
                set_faction_standing khand turks -1.00
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter blue_wizards_succeed = 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance turks khand allied
                set_faction_standing turks khand 1.00
                set_faction_standing khand turks 1.00
            end_if
            console_command diplomatic_stance turks milan allied
            set_faction_standing turks milan 1.00
            set_faction_standing milan turks 1.00
            if I_NumberOfSettlements poland > 0
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                increment_kings_purse poland 300
            end_if
            if I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                increment_kings_purse england 1000
                add_money england 3000
            end_if
            if I_NumberOfSettlements spain > 0 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain

            end_if
            if I_NumberOfSettlements khand > 0 
            and I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
            and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_fail = 1
                increment_kings_purse khand 300
            end_if
            console_command remove_trait aragorn_1 Aragorn

            change_battle_model turks leader elessar

    ;###################### Script: Barrow Downs #########################

    declare_counter crypts_set
    declare_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave
	
		if I_EventCounter Barrow_Population_Bonus = 1
			console_command add_population Cardolan 50
			set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 0
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter restored_crypts = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Cardolan
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hre
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = portugal
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = france
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = poland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = england
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
                and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good = 0
                kill_character Barrow-wight
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = slave
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = sicily
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = denmark
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled denmark
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = milan
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = normans
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = scotland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = timurids
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled timurids
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = byzantium
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = moors
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hungary
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = norway
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = saxons
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = ireland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled ireland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = mongols
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = teutonic_order
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = venice
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = aztecs
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled aztecs
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = spain
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = russia
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = khand
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if not I_IsFactionAIControlled khand
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
        and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 490, y 12
                    traits	ScriptedBesieger 2
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army

                end

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts england false

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts spain false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts gundabad false
                end_if				
                if I_LocalFaction russia
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts russia false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction khand
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts khand false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                move TemporarySpotter, 490, 11
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
            replenish_units Barrow-wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 2
                and I_SettlementUnderSiege Cardolan
                and I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 2, 166, 372
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	TemporarySpotter, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 166, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 166, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 166, 371
                end_if

                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 372
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 372
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 372
                    move TemporarySpotter, 167, 371
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 166, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 166, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 373
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 166, 373
                end_if
                reposition_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    create_unit Barrow-wight, Snaga Catapult, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                    siege_settlement Barrow-wight, Cardolan, attack
                end_if
                set_counter sieges_testing 0
            end_if
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 0
            and RandomPercent <= 20
            inc_counter crypts_spawns 1
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 1
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_1
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_1
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_1, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
				set_event_counter Barrow_Population_Bonus 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 2
                spawn_army

                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
