        if I_CompareCounter weakened_gondor = 0
            and I_EventCounter reunited_kingdom = 0
            set_counter weakened_gondor 1f
            if I_NumberOfSettlements sicily > 6
                and I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily
                set_counter weakened_gondor 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter weakened_gondor = 1
                increment_kings_purse sicily 250
				historic_event minas_tirith_revenge
                spawn_army
                    faction sicily
                    character	random_name, named character, age 44, x 320, y 215, family, direction N
                    traits		DunedainRace 1, Gondorian 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAdministrator 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodDefender 2, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, StrategicSkill 2
                    unit		Gondor Bodyguard		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Citadel Guard		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Citadel Guard		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1					
                    unit		Gondor Spearmen	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Spearmen	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Spearmen	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0	
                    unit		Gondor Spearmen	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0					
                    unit		Gondor Infantry	exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Infantry	exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Infantry	exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Infantry	exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Gondor Archers		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Gondor Archers		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Lossarnach Axemen	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Lossarnach Axemen	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Ithilien Rangers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Ithilien Rangers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Ithilien Rangers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter weakened_faction_reinf = 7
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	;#########################Pope Sauron
	declare_counter go_pope
	declare_counter pope_timer
	declare_counter timer_boost
	
	set_counter pope_timer 1
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
		inc_counter pope_timer 1
		
		if I_NumberOfSettlements hre = 0
			and I_CompareCounter timer_boost = 0
			inc_counter pope_timer 20
			set_counter timer_boost 1
		end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
			and I_CompareCounter timer_boost = 0
			inc_counter pope_timer 20
			set_counter timer_boost 1
		end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
			and I_CompareCounter timer_boost = 0
			inc_counter pope_timer 20
			set_counter timer_boost 1
		end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements france = 0
			and I_CompareCounter timer_boost = 0
			inc_counter pope_timer 20
			set_counter timer_boost 1
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter pope_timer > 110
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
		and I_CompareCounter pope_timer >= 110
		spawn_character papal_states, The_Dark_Lord, priest, age 18, x 475, y 402
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord NaturalPriestSkill 2
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord StrongFaith 4
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord PriestLevel 2
		set_counter go_pope 1
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
		and I_CompareCounter go_pope > 0
		and not I_CharacterExists The_Dark_Lord
		spawn_character papal_states, The_Dark_Lord, priest, age 18, x 475, y 402
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord NaturalPriestSkill 2
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord StrongFaith 4
		console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord PriestLevel 2
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
		and Treasury > 15000
		add_money papal_states -10000
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
        
		if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
			kill_character The_Dark_Lord
            console_command kill_faction papal_states
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    ;#####################################################################
    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;#####################################################################
    ; Revamped by gsthoed and team for DaC.

    ;######################### Part 1: Global ############################

    ;###### Counters
    if I_LocalFaction england
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 2
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction aztecs
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction france
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction hre
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction poland
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction portugal
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if

    if I_LocalFaction russia
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction spain
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction venice
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if
    if I_LocalFaction gundabad
        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
    end_if	
    declare_counter ring_timer
    declare_counter ring_jumped
    declare_counter rptesting
    declare_counter ring_possession
    declare_counter endRing
    declare_counter Saruman_ring_choice_awaiting_answer

    if I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 0
        declare_counter council_atsettlement
        declare_counter ring_choiceSet
        set_event_counter sauron_ai -1
    end_if
    if I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 1
        declare_counter barad_foreign
        declare_counter morannon_foreign
        declare_counter keep_ring_isengard
        set_counter endRing -1
    end_if

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd I_TurnNumber = 25
		if I_LocalFaction khand
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        set_counter ring_timer 26
        set_event_counter sauron_ai 0
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction > 0
            set_counter endRing 0
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;###### Campaign start
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        if ! I_LocalFaction france
            set_event_counter saruman_ring_event -1
            set_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard -1;"Immortal Nazguls"
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                declare_counter goodFailed_enedwaith
                set_counter endRing -1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_counter endRing -1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction > 0
            set_event_counter council_event_accepted -1
            set_event_counter council_event2_accepted -1
            set_event_counter council_event3_accepted -1
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 246, y 384, label ors_1 ; at Imladris
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 81, y 382, label ors_2 ; at Mithlond
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 262, y 387, label ors_3 ; at Caras Galadhon
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 370, y 232, label ors_4 ; at Barad-dur
                traits	RingbearerBarad 2
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            console_command give_ancillary ors_1 one_ring
            console_command give_ancillary ors_2 one_ring
            console_command give_ancillary ors_3 one_ring
            console_command give_ancillary ors_4 one_ring
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction != 1
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	random_name, named character,  age 25, x 350, y 248, label ors_5 ; at Morannon
                traits	RingbearerBarad 2
                unit		Nazg Hai		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            console_command give_ancillary ors_5 one_ring
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction england
            give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
            set_counter endRing -2
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction sicily
            give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction denmark
            give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction milan
            give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction turks
            give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction scotland
            give_everything_to_faction scripts scotland false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction timurids
            give_everything_to_faction scripts timurids false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            give_everything_to_faction scripts byzantium false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            give_everything_to_faction scripts moors false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            give_everything_to_faction scripts hungary false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            give_everything_to_faction scripts norway false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction saxons
            give_everything_to_faction scripts saxons false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction ireland
            give_everything_to_faction scripts ireland false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction mongols
            give_everything_to_faction scripts mongols false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction venice
            give_everything_to_faction scripts venice false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction poland
            give_everything_to_faction scripts poland false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction france
            give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction aztecs
            give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction hre
            give_everything_to_faction scripts hre false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction portugal
            give_everything_to_faction scripts portugal false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction spain
            give_everything_to_faction scripts spain false
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction gundabad
            give_everything_to_faction scripts gundabad false
        end_if		
        if I_LocalFaction russia
            give_everything_to_faction scripts russia false
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction > 0
            kill_character ors_1
            kill_character ors_2
            kill_character ors_3
            kill_character ors_4
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction != 1
            and not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
			and not I_LocalFaction khand
            kill_character ors_5
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            console_command give_ancillary z8 one_ring
            console_command mp z8 -1
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType england
        console_command remove_ancillary z8 one_ring
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd Trait Saruman = 1
        if not I_LocalFaction france
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType france
        if not I_LocalFaction france
            console_command remove_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;###### Miscellaneous
    ; Enedwaith becomes evil
    monitor_event FactionAllianceDeclared FactionIsLocal
        and TargetReligion catholic

        if ! I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if

        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
        set_event_counter council_event_accepted -1
        set_event_counter council_event2_accepted -1
        set_event_counter council_event3_accepted -1
        declare_counter keep_ring_isengard
        declare_counter barad_foreign
        declare_counter morannon_foreign
        set_event_counter sauron_ai 0

        ; Good factions hate you for your decision
        console_command message_collation_set on
        set_faction_standing sicily teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing denmark teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing milan teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing normans teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing turks teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing scotland teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing timurids teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing byzantium teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing moors teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing hungary teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing norway teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing ireland teutonic_order -1
        set_faction_standing mongols teutonic_order -1
        console_command message_collation_set off

        if I_TurnNumber <= 38
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0
        set_counter ring_timer 0

        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession > 1
            set_counter ring_possession 2
            point_at_settlement Udun
            historic_event ring_deliver
        end_if
        set_event_counter council_accept 0
        set_event_counter council_event  0
        set_event_counter council_event2 0
        set_event_counter council_event3 0
        set_event_counter council_decline 0
        set_event_counter council_alternative_accept 0
        if I_EventCounter QuestToDestroyRing = 1
            increment_kings_purse teutonic_order -500
            set_event_counter QuestToDestroyRing 0
        end_if

        set_counter endRing 0
        if I_CompareCounter goodFailed_enedwaith = 1
            set_counter endRing 1
            set_counter ring_possession 6
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

	; Khand becomes evil
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType blue_wizards_end
		and EventCounter = 1

        if ! I_LocalFaction khand
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter civil_war = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

        set_event_counter EvilFaction 1
        set_event_counter council_event_accepted -1
        set_event_counter council_event2_accepted -1
        set_event_counter council_event3_accepted -1
        declare_counter keep_ring_isengard
        declare_counter barad_foreign
        declare_counter morannon_foreign
        
		set_counter ring_timer 26
		set_event_counter sauron_ai 0
        set_counter endRing 0
		
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    ; AI ringbearer dead
    monitor_event PostBattle HasAncType relic_ring
        and not CharacterIsLocal
        and Trait Sauron = 0
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            historic_event dead_ring event/dead_ring.bik
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Gollum
    monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType gollum
        and not HasAncType relic_ring
        console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            and I_EventCounter ring_failed_evil = 0
            and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Random loss
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        and Trait NazgulRace = 0
        and Trait Sauron = 0
        and Trait Saruman = 0
        and I_CompareCounter ring_possession > 5
        and not IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province, Udun_Province
        and RandomPercent <= 2
        and RandomPercent > 90
        e_select_character
        console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            set_event_counter ring_deliver 0
            if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum
                console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
                if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum
                    historic_event ring_stolen event/ring_stolen.bik
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ring_stolen = 0
                historic_event ring_stolen2
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_event_counter ring_stolen 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Game Reloaded
    monitor_event GameReloaded I_TurnNumber > 38
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver = 1
            point_at_settlement Udun
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter QuestToDestroyRing = 1
            point_at_strat_position 361, 233
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_event > 0
            point_at_strat_position 246, 384
            snap_strat_camera 246, 384
            historic_event council_event true
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_event2 > 0
            point_at_strat_position 81, 382
            snap_strat_camera 81, 382
            historic_event council_event2 true
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_event3 > 0
            point_at_strat_position 262, 387
            snap_strat_camera 262, 387
            historic_event council_event3 true
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_hobbiton = 1
            point_at_settlement Shire_North
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_imladris = 1
            point_at_settlement Imladris
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_edoras = 1
            point_at_settlement Kings_Land
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_dolamroth = 1
            point_at_settlement Anorien
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_hornburg = 1
            point_at_settlement Helms_Deep
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_bree = 1
            point_at_settlement Bree
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_thranduil = 1
            point_at_settlement Elven_Mirkwood
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_dale = 1
            point_at_settlement Dale
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_erebor = 1
            point_at_settlement Erebor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_mithlond = 1
            point_at_settlement Mithlond
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_carasgaladhon = 1
            point_at_settlement Celebrant
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_carassant = 1
            point_at_settlement Dorwinion
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_thorin = 1
            point_at_settlement Nan_i_Naugrim
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_isengard = 1
            point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_duneard = 1
            point_at_settlement Duneard
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_shedun = 1
            point_at_settlement Mt_Gram
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_carndum = 1
            point_at_settlement Carn_Dum
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_khazaddum = 1
            point_at_settlement East_Moria
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_goblintown = 1
            point_at_settlement High_Pass
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_umbar = 1
            point_at_settlement Umbar
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_gobelancalimon = 1
            point_at_settlement Gobel_Ancalimon
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_mistrand = 1
            point_at_settlement Mistrand
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_dolguldur = 1
            point_at_settlement Deep_Mirkwood
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter one_ring_baraddur = 1
            and I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 0
            point_at_settlement Gorgoroth
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### Ring Possession Test
    monitor_event MultiTurnMove I_CompareCounter rptesting = 1
        and FactionwideAncillaryExists one_ring
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        inc_counter ring_possession 1
        set_event_counter RingPossession 1
    end_monitor

    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;###################### Part 2: Good Factions ########################

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_EventCounter sauron_ai = 0
        if I_EventCounter ring_betrayal = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_decline = 1
            historic_event council_decline
            set_event_counter council_decline 0
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_alternative_accept = 1
            historic_event council_alternative_accept
            set_event_counter council_alternative_accept 0
        end_if
        set_event_counter Council_skip 0
        set_event_counter council_late 0
        set_event_counter ring_failed_good 0
        set_event_counter DFS_penalty 0

        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction > 0
            and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
            and I_EventCounter one_ring_baraddur = 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        set_event_counter RingPossession 0
        set_counter rptesting 1

        ;###### Part A: ring timers ######
        if ! I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
            if I_HotseatEnabled 
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_counter rptesting -1
            ;### Barad timer
            if I_EventCounter one_ring_baraddur > 0
                set_counter ring_timer 0
                inc_event_counter one_ring_baraddur 1
                if I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 1
                    set_event_counter one_ring_baraddur 5
                    ui_flash_stop
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                    set_event_counter one_ring_baraddur 0
                    ui_flash_stop
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter one_ring_baraddur = 5
                set_event_counter one_ring_baraddur 0
                ui_flash_stop
                historic_event sauron_ai event/sauron.bik
                create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruks,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Orc Maulers,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Orc Band,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Morannon Guard,		num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                create_unit sauron_1, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                console_command give_ancillary Sauron one_ring2
                reposition_character sauron_1, 370, 232
                console_command message_collation_set on
                console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england milan war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england turks war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england moors war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england norway war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england denmark war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england timurids war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england normans war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england hungary war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england saxons war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england ireland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance england byzantium war
                if I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 1
                    add_money teutonic_order 10000
                    add_money england 10000
                    increment_kings_purse england 2500
                    set_faction_standing teutonic_order england 1
                    set_faction_standing england teutonic_order 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order england allied
                    set_counter endRing 1
                    set_counter ring_possession 6
                    console_command message_collation_set off
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
                console_command diplomatic_stance england teutonic_order war
                console_command message_collation_set off
                increment_kings_purse england 5000
                if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                    set_counter goodFailed_enedwaith 1
                end_if
                historic_event ring_failed_good
                set_event_counter DFS_penalty 1
            end_if
            ;### ring_timer
            if not I_LocalFaction khand
				inc_counter ring_timer 1
			end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
				and I_EventCounter blue_wizards_end = 1
				inc_counter ring_timer 1
			end_if
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 25
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 25
                if I_CompareCounter ring_jumped = 7
                    and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                    set_counter ring_jumped 8
                    point_at_settlement Gorgoroth
                    snap_strat_camera 372, 232
                    historic_event one_ring_baraddur
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if not I_LocalFaction milan
                    and I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    if I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = france
                        and RandomPercent <= 7
                        point_at_settlement Nan_Curunir
                        snap_strat_camera 224, 279
                        historic_event one_ring_isengard
                        inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                        set_counter ring_timer 0
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                        and I_SettlementOwner Duneard = aztecs
                        and RandomPercent <= 6
                        point_at_settlement Duneard
                        snap_strat_camera 205, 286
                        historic_event one_ring_duneard
                        inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                        set_counter ring_timer 0
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gram = portugal
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    point_at_settlement Mt_Gram
                    snap_strat_camera 224, 442
                    historic_event one_ring_shedun
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = portugal
                    and RandomPercent <= 9
                    point_at_settlement Carn_Dum
                    snap_strat_camera 207, 453
                    historic_event one_ring_carndum
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hre
                    and RandomPercent <= 9
                    point_at_settlement East_Moria
                    snap_strat_camera 245, 341
                    historic_event one_ring_khazaddum
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner High_Pass = hre
                    and RandomPercent <= 9
                    point_at_settlement High_Pass
                    snap_strat_camera 260, 393
                    historic_event one_ring_goblintown
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = russia
                    and RandomPercent <= 7
                    point_at_settlement Umbar
                    snap_strat_camera 265, 81
                    historic_event one_ring_umbar
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Gobel_Ancalimon = spain
                    and RandomPercent <= 5
                    point_at_settlement Gobel_Ancalimon
                    snap_strat_camera 325, 121
                    historic_event one_ring_gobelancalimon
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Mistrand = venice
                    and RandomPercent <= 4
                    point_at_settlement Mistrand
                    snap_strat_camera 466, 301
                    historic_event one_ring_mistrand
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = poland
                    and RandomPercent <= 9
                    point_at_settlement Deep_Mirkwood
                    snap_strat_camera 299, 329
                    historic_event one_ring_dolguldur
                    inc_counter ring_jumped 1
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if

        ;###### Part B: Ring Possession Test ######
        if I_EventCounter council_start = 1
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_event_counter RingPossession 1
            set_counter ring_possession 30
            set_counter rptesting 0;don't do the RP test
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter rptesting = 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer > 0
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0
                set_counter ring_timer 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_baraddur 0
            end_if
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	TemporaryRing, named character, x 390, y 482
                unit		Sauron		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing gollum
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction sicily
                give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction denmark
                give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction milan
                give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction normans
                give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction turks
                give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction scotland
                give_everything_to_faction scripts scotland false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction timurids
                give_everything_to_faction scripts timurids false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                give_everything_to_faction scripts byzantium false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction moors
                give_everything_to_faction scripts moors false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hungary
                give_everything_to_faction scripts hungary false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction norway
                give_everything_to_faction scripts norway false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                give_everything_to_faction scripts saxons false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction ireland
                give_everything_to_faction scripts ireland false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction mongols
                give_everything_to_faction scripts mongols false
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                give_everything_to_faction scripts teutonic_order false
            end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
                give_everything_to_faction scripts khand false
            end_if
            console_command mp TemporaryRing -1
            move TemporaryRing, 389, 482
            set_counter rptesting 0
            if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
                historic_event celebrate_ringbearer event/fellowship_victory.bik
                console_command remove_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                select_character TemporaryRing ; Terminate Gollum monitor
                kill_character TemporaryRing
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            kill_character TemporaryRing
        end_if

        ;###### Part C: We don't have the One Ring ######
        if I_EventCounter RingPossession = 0
            and I_CompareCounter ring_possession > 0
            set_counter ring_possession 0
            ui_flash_stop
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_event_counter council_event_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_event2_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_event3_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_start 0
            set_counter ring_choiceSet 0
        end_if
        ;### Give our money back!
        if I_EventCounter QuestToDestroyRing = 1
            and I_EventCounter RingPossession = 0
            set_event_counter QuestToDestroyRing 0
            if I_LocalFaction sicily
                increment_kings_purse sicily -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction milan
                increment_kings_purse milan -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction turks
                increment_kings_purse turks -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction mongols
                increment_kings_purse mongols -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction moors
                increment_kings_purse moors -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction scotland
                increment_kings_purse scotland -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction norway
                increment_kings_purse norway -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction denmark
                increment_kings_purse denmark -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                increment_kings_purse byzantium -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction timurids
                increment_kings_purse timurids -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction normans
                increment_kings_purse normans -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hungary
                increment_kings_purse hungary -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                increment_kings_purse saxons -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction ireland
                increment_kings_purse ireland -500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                increment_kings_purse teutonic_order -500
            end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
                increment_kings_purse khand -500
            end_if
        end_if

        ;###### Part D: We have the One Ring ######
        ;### One Ring acquired
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 1
            historic_event one_ring_acquired_good
			inc_counter pope_timer 110
            set_event_counter dead_ring 0 ;no AI ringbearer exists
        end_if

        ;### Change course if Council's place has been captured
        if I_EventCounter council_event_accepted = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Imladris != saxons
            ui_flash_stop
            historic_event council_place_captured
            set_event_counter council_event_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_counter ring_possession 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_event2_accepted = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond != saxons
            ui_flash_stop
            historic_event council_place_captured
            set_event_counter council_event2_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_counter ring_possession 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_event3_accepted = 3
            and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant != ireland
            ui_flash_stop
            historic_event council_place_captured
            set_event_counter council_event3_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_counter ring_possession 1
        end_if

        ;### Missed council's meeting
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 27
            ui_flash_stop
            historic_event council_late
            set_event_counter council_accept 0
            set_event_counter council_event_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_event2_accepted 0
            set_event_counter council_event3_accepted 0
            set_counter ring_possession 30
        end_if

        ;### White Council's call
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 2
            if I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                set_counter council_atsettlement 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0
                and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
                set_counter council_atsettlement 2
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0
                and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                set_counter council_atsettlement 3
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = aztecs
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = england
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = france
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = hre
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = poland
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = portugal
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = russia
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = spain
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = venice
                and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = slave
                set_counter council_atsettlement 1
                set_event_counter council_alternative_accept 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = aztecs
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = england
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = france
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = hre
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = poland
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = portugal
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = russia
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = spain
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = venice
                and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = slave
                set_counter council_atsettlement 2
                set_event_counter council_alternative_accept 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = aztecs
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = england
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = france
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = hre
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = poland
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = portugal
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = russia
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = spain
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = venice
                and not I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = slave
                set_counter council_atsettlement 3
                set_event_counter council_alternative_accept 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 1
                point_at_strat_position 246, 384
                snap_strat_camera 246, 384
                zoom_strat_camera 0.5
                historic_event council_event true
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 2
                point_at_strat_position 81, 382
                snap_strat_camera 81, 382
                zoom_strat_camera 0.5
                historic_event council_event2 true
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 3
                point_at_strat_position 268, 327
                snap_strat_camera 268, 327
                zoom_strat_camera 0.5
                historic_event council_event3 true
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement = 0 ;if nothing else, then skip meeting
                set_event_counter Council_skip 1 ; see DFS
                set_counter ring_choiceSet 1
                set_counter ring_possession 30
            end_if
        end_if
        ;### Answers to White Council's invitation
        if I_CompareCounter council_atsettlement > 0
            set_counter council_atsettlement 0
            while I_EventCounter council_event_accepted = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event_declined = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event2_accepted = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event2_declined = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event3_accepted = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event3_declined = 0
            end_while
            set_event_counter council_event 0
            set_event_counter council_event2 0
            set_event_counter council_event3 0
            if I_EventCounter council_event_declined = 0 ; Council accepted
                and I_EventCounter council_event2_declined = 0
                and I_EventCounter council_event3_declined = 0
                historic_event council_accept
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter council_accept = 0 ; Council declined
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter council_decline 1
                set_event_counter DFS_penalty 1
                set_event_counter council_event_declined 0
                set_event_counter council_event2_declined 0
                set_event_counter council_event3_declined 0
                set_counter ring_possession 30
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter council_event_accepted = 1 ;if council was accepted, improve diplomatic relations
                if I_LocalFaction sicily
                    set_faction_standing sicily saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons sicily 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction milan
                    set_faction_standing milan saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons milan 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance milan saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction turks
                    set_faction_standing turks saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons turks 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance turks saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction mongols
                    set_faction_standing mongols saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons mongols 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance mongols saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction moors
                    set_faction_standing moors saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons moors 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance moors saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction scotland
                    set_faction_standing scotland saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons scotland 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance scotland saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction norway
                    set_faction_standing norway saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons norway 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance norway saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction denmark
                    set_faction_standing denmark saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons denmark 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                    set_faction_standing byzantium saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons byzantium 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction timurids
                    set_faction_standing timurids saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons timurids 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance timurids saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction normans
                    set_faction_standing normans saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons normans 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance normans saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction hungary
                    set_faction_standing hungary saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons hungary 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance hungary saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction ireland
                    set_faction_standing ireland saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons ireland 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance ireland saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                    set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order saxons Allied
                end_if
				if I_LocalFaction khand
                    set_faction_standing khand saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons khand 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance khand saxons Allied
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter council_event2_accepted = 1
                if I_LocalFaction sicily
                    set_faction_standing sicily saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons sicily 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction milan
                    set_faction_standing milan saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons milan 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance milan saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction turks
                    set_faction_standing turks saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons turks 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance turks saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction mongols
                    set_faction_standing mongols saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons mongols 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance mongols saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction moors
                    set_faction_standing moors saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons moors 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance moors saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction scotland
                    set_faction_standing scotland saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons scotland 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance scotland saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction norway
                    set_faction_standing norway saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons norway 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance norway saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction denmark
                    set_faction_standing denmark saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons denmark 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                    set_faction_standing byzantium saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons byzantium 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction timurids
                    set_faction_standing timurids saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons timurids 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance timurids saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction normans
                    set_faction_standing normans saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons normans 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance normans saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction hungary
                    set_faction_standing hungary saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons hungary 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance hungary saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction ireland
                    set_faction_standing ireland saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons ireland 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance ireland saxons Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                    set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order saxons Allied
                end_if
				if I_LocalFaction khand
                    set_faction_standing khand saxons 1
                    set_faction_standing saxons khand 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance khand saxons Allied
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter council_event3_accepted = 1
                if I_LocalFaction sicily
                    set_faction_standing sicily ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland sicily 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance sicily ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction milan
                    set_faction_standing milan ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland milan 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance milan ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction turks
                    set_faction_standing turks ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland turks 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance turks ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction mongols
                    set_faction_standing mongols ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland mongols 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance mongols ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction moors
                    set_faction_standing moors ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland moors 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance moors ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction scotland
                    set_faction_standing scotland ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland scotland 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance scotland ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction norway
                    set_faction_standing norway ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland norway 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance norway ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction denmark
                    set_faction_standing denmark ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland denmark 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance denmark ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                    set_faction_standing byzantium ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland byzantium 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction timurids
                    set_faction_standing timurids ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland timurids 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance timurids ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction normans
                    set_faction_standing normans ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland normans 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance normans ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction hungary
                    set_faction_standing hungary ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland hungary 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance hungary ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction saxons
                    set_faction_standing saxons ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland hungary 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance saxons ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction ireland
                    set_faction_standing saxons ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland saxons 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance ireland ireland Allied
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                    set_faction_standing teutonic_order ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland teutonic_order 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order ireland Allied
                end_if
				if I_LocalFaction khand
                    set_faction_standing khand ireland 1
                    set_faction_standing ireland khand 1
                    console_command diplomatic_stance khand ireland Allied
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if

        ;### Trigger ring_choice mission
        if I_CompareCounter ring_choiceSet = 1
            if I_LocalFaction sicily
                set_religion sicily catholic
                create_mission ring_choice sicily
                set_religion sicily islam
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction milan
                set_religion milan catholic
                create_mission ring_choice milan
                set_religion milan northmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction turks
                set_religion turks catholic
                create_mission ring_choice turks
                set_religion turks islam
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction scotland
                set_religion scotland catholic
                create_mission ring_choice scotland
                set_religion scotland northmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction moors
                set_religion moors catholic
                create_mission ring_choice moors
                set_religion moors dwarven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction mongols
                set_religion mongols catholic
                create_mission ring_choice mongols
                set_religion mongols elven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction timurids
                set_religion timurids catholic
                create_mission ring_choice timurids
                set_religion timurids northmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction normans
                set_religion normans catholic
                create_mission ring_choice normans
                set_religion normans wildmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction denmark
                set_religion denmark catholic
                create_mission ring_choice denmark
                set_religion denmark islam
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hungary
                set_religion hungary catholic
                create_mission ring_choice hungary
                set_religion hungary dwarven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction norway
                set_religion norway catholic
                create_mission ring_choice norway
                set_religion norway dwarven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                set_religion saxons catholic
                create_mission ring_choice saxons
                set_religion saxons elven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction ireland
                set_religion ireland catholic
                create_mission ring_choice ireland
                set_religion ireland elven
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                set_religion teutonic_order catholic
                create_mission ring_choice teutonic_order
                set_religion teutonic_order wildmen
            end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_religion khand catholic
                create_mission ring_choice khand
                set_religion khand nomadic
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                set_religion byzantium catholic
                create_mission ring_choice byzantium
                set_religion byzantium northmen
            end_if
            set_counter ring_choiceSet 0
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter council_start = 1
            set_counter ring_choiceSet 1
            set_event_counter council_start 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### White Council's meeting starts ######
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and IsRegionOneOf Imladris_Province
        and I_EventCounter council_event_accepted != 0
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        if I_EventCounter council_event_accepted = -1; Ring ends or EvilFaction=1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        historic_event council_start
        set_event_counter council_event_accepted 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and IsRegionOneOf Mithlond_Province
        and I_EventCounter council_event2_accepted != 0
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        if I_EventCounter council_event2_accepted = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        historic_event council_start
        set_event_counter council_event2_accepted 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and IsRegionOneOf Celebrant_Province
        and I_EventCounter council_event3_accepted != 0
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        if I_EventCounter council_event3_accepted = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        historic_event council_start
        set_event_counter council_event3_accepted 0
    end_monitor

    ;### Ring choice: Accepts task of going to Mount Doom
    monitor_event MissionFinished MissionID ring_choice
        if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            set_event_counter QuestToDestroyRing 1 ;used in EDCT
            console_command add_money 10000
            if I_LocalFaction sicily
                increment_kings_purse sicily 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction milan
                increment_kings_purse milan 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction turks
                increment_kings_purse turks 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction mongols
                increment_kings_purse mongols 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction moors
                increment_kings_purse moors 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction scotland
                increment_kings_purse scotland 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction norway
                increment_kings_purse norway 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction denmark
                increment_kings_purse denmark 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                increment_kings_purse byzantium 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction timurids
                increment_kings_purse timurids 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction normans
                increment_kings_purse normans 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hungary
                increment_kings_purse hungary 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                increment_kings_purse saxons 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction ireland
                increment_kings_purse ireland 500
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                increment_kings_purse teutonic_order 500
            end_if
			if I_LocalFaction khand
                increment_kings_purse khand 500
            end_if
            disable_cursor
            disable_shortcuts true
            select_ui_element faction_button
            simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
            hide_ui
            snap_strat_camera 361, 233 ; Mount Doom's coordinates.
            point_at_strat_position 361, 233
            campaign_wait 0.1
            show_ui
            enable_cursor
            disable_shortcuts false
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### The Destruction of the One Ring ######
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and Trait RingbearerBarad = 2
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction > 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        if I_LocalFaction sicily
            set_religion sicily catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing sicily
            set_religion sicily islam
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction milan
            set_religion milan catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing milan
            set_religion milan northmen
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction turks
            set_religion turks catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing turks
            set_religion turks islam
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction scotland
            set_religion scotland catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing scotland
            set_religion scotland northmen
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            set_religion moors catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing moors
            set_religion moors dwarven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction mongols
            set_religion mongols catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing mongols
            set_religion mongols elven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction timurids
            set_religion timurids catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing timurids
            set_religion timurids northmen
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            set_religion normans catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing normans
            set_religion normans wildmen
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction denmark
            set_religion denmark catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing denmark
            set_religion denmark islam
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            set_religion hungary catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing hungary
            set_religion hungary dwarven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            set_religion norway catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing norway
            set_religion norway dwarven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction saxons
            set_religion saxons catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing saxons
            set_religion saxons elven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction ireland
            set_religion ireland catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing ireland
            set_religion ireland elven
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            set_religion teutonic_order catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing teutonic_order
            set_religion teutonic_order wildmen
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction khand
            set_religion khand catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing khand
            set_religion khand nomadic
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            set_religion byzantium catholic
            create_mission destroyOneRing byzantium
            set_religion byzantium northmen
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event MissionFinished MissionID destroyOneRing
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            set_counter endRing 1
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0

            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            set_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion -1

            set_event_counter council_event_accepted -1
            set_event_counter council_event2_accepted -1
            set_event_counter council_event3_accepted -1
            set_event_counter QuestToDestroyRing 0
            set_counter ring_possession 6

            campaign_wait 0.1
            console_command clear_messages
            disable_cursor
            disable_shortcuts true
			
            hide_ui
            reveal_tile 361, 231
            move_strat_camera 361, 236
            campaign_wait 0.3
            zoom_strat_camera 0.6
            campaign_wait 3.3
			show_ui
            historic_event mount_doom event/ring_destroyed.bik
            campaign_wait 0.1
            hide_ui
            campaign_wait 30
            console_command clear_messages
			campaign_wait 0.1
			show_ui
			campaign_wait 0.1
			
			hide_ui
			add_events
                event volcano ring_eruption
                date 0
                position 361, 231
                scale 4
            end_add_events
			campaign_wait 7
			console_command clear_messages
			show_ui
			
            historic_event ring_destroyed event/evil_loose.bik
            campaign_wait 0.1
            hide_ui
            campaign_wait 82
            console_command clear_messages
			historic_event mordor_destroyed
			set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1 ;kill Mordor Nazguls
            set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2 ;kill DG Nazguls
            set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            campaign_wait 1
            disable_movie_view
            campaign_wait 0.1
            show_ui
            enable_cursor
            disable_shortcuts false
			campaign_wait 4
			set_event_counter OneRingDestroyed 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	;This part has been removed out of the monitor_event MissionFinished MissionID destroyOneRing to prevent the One Ring crashing the game. /by racer999
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType OneRingDestroyed
		if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
			destroy_units england Sauron
			console_command kill_faction england
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;########### Part 3: Commmon Ring Path for Evil Factions #############

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter endRing != -1

        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction != 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter ring_betrayal = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        set_counter rptesting 1
        set_event_counter RingPossession 0

        ;###### Part A: ring timers ######
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            and I_CompareCounter endRing = 0
            if I_HotseatEnabled 
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_counter rptesting -1
            inc_counter ring_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 25
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 25
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                and I_SettlementOwner Shire_North = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Shire_North
                    snap_strat_camera 133, 385
                    historic_event one_ring_hobbiton
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Imladris
                    snap_strat_camera 246, 384
                    historic_event one_ring_imladris
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Anorien
                    snap_strat_camera 324, 217
                    historic_event one_ring_minastirith
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = milan
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Kings_Land
                    snap_strat_camera 249, 249
                    historic_event one_ring_edoras
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = denmark
                    and RandomPercent <= 7
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 243, 190
                    point_at_settlement Belfalas
                    historic_event one_ring_dolamroth
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Helms_Deep = milan
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 230, 260
                    point_at_settlement Helms_Deep
                    historic_event one_ring_hornburg
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Bree = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 130, 257
                    point_at_settlement Bree
                    historic_event one_ring_bree
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 325, 413
                    point_at_settlement Elven_Mirkwood
                    historic_event one_ring_thranduil
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dale = scotland
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 328, 417
                    point_at_settlement Dale
                    historic_event one_ring_dale
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 339, 421
                    point_at_settlement Erebor
                    historic_event one_ring_erebor
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 81, 382
                    point_at_settlement Mithlond
                    historic_event one_ring_mithlond
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = ireland
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 268, 327
                    point_at_settlement Celebrant
                    historic_event one_ring_carasgaladhon
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dorwinion = byzantium
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 441, 339
                    point_at_settlement Dorwinion
                    historic_event one_ring_carassant
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Nan_i_Naugrim = hungary
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 66, 443
                    point_at_settlement Nan_i_Naugrim
                    historic_event one_ring_thorin
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter rptesting = 1; I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring true
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer > 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
                set_counter ring_timer 0
            end_if

            ;###### Part B: Ring Possession Test ######
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	TemporaryRing, named character,  age 25, x 390, y 482
                unit		Sauron	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
