    ; This "script" is linked with the "One Ring"
    declare_counter respawn_nazgul
    declare_counter nazgula_timer
    declare_counter nazgulb_timer
    declare_counter nazgulc_timer
    declare_counter nazgulg_timer
    declare_counter nazgulh_timer
    declare_counter nazguli_timer
    declare_counter nazgula_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulb_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulc_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulg_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulh_reborn
    declare_counter nazguli_reborn
    declare_counter nr_Mordor
    declare_counter nazguld_timer
    declare_counter nazgule_timer
    declare_counter nazgulf_timer
    declare_counter nazguld_reborn
    declare_counter nazgule_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulf_reborn
    declare_counter nr_DGolgur

    ; Dol Guldur Destroyed
    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement TargetFactionType poland
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 0
                    and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 13
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### Sauron's Nazguls
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0
        if I_EventCounter sauron_lost = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ;*********** DG Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur < 3
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                and I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguld_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                and I_CompareCounter nazgule_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgule_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulf_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulf_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
                and I_NumberOfSettlements poland > 0
                if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = poland
                    historic_event nazgul_returned_dolguldur
                end_if
                set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
            end_if
        end_if
        ;*********** Mordor Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor < 6
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn < 60
                inc_counter nazgula_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgula_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
						if not I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
						and not I_EventCounter WKcangotoBREE = 1
							set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
							historic_event nazgul_returned_carndum
                            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
							set_event_counter WKcangotoCD 0
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter WKcangotoBREE = 1
							historic_event nazgul_returned_bree
                            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
							set_event_counter WKcangotoBREE 0
			end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulb_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulc
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 30
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulc_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulc_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulc_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulg
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 20
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulg_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulg_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulg_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulh
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 10
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulh_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulh_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulh_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguli
                and I_CompareCounter nazguli_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguli_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazguli_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
            historic_event nazgul_returned_mordor
            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor = 6
            and I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur = 3
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_carndum
		set_counter nazgula_timer 0
		inc_counter nazgula_reborn 1
		spawn_army
			faction portugal
			character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 204, y 453, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_p1
			traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
			unit		Guardians of Carn Dum		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
		end
		if not I_LocalFaction portugal
		console_command give_trait nazgula_p1 AIBoost 1
		end_if
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 ring_witchking
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_flail
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_helmet
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_mordor
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_mordor = -1
            set_counter nr_Mordor 6
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
            set_counter nazgula_timer 0

                    traits	Nazgul 9, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2, NazgulEpithet 9
                    unit		Temple Marksmen		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit 		Orc Band		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if not I_LocalFaction england
                    console_command give_trait nazguli_r1 AIBoost 1
                end_if
                console_command give_ancillary nazguli_r1 ring_nazguli
                console_command give_ancillary nazguli_r1 nazgul_sword
            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ;###### Saruman's Nazguls
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ImmortalNazgulsIsengard
        if I_EventCounter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
            and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer < 340
            inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 340
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f17
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f17 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f17
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f17, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 320
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f16
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f16 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f16
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f16, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType normans

	if I_CompareCounter timer = 1	;Testing Chamber
	;historic_event bd_ho_angmar_objective factions { normans, }
	;set_event_counter unholy_alliance 1
	;set_event_counter luin_ring_accepted 1
	;console_command move_character "Andy" 91,353
	;console_command auto_win attacker
	;siege_settlement breeheir, South_Ered_Luin, attack
	;inc_counter finale_home_timer 7
	;inc_counter bree_morality_counter -6
	;set_event_counter home_finale_active 1
	set_event_counter home_finale_evil_rebellion 1
	end_if

	inc_counter timer 1
;######################### Pure Evil Final Victory ##########################
	if I_EventCounter unholy_alliance = 1
	and I_EventCounter ua_rangers_destroyed = 1
	and I_EventCounter ua_elves_destroyed = 1
	and I_EventCounter witch_king_victory = 0
		;set_faction_banner
                ;faction normans
                ;banner scripts
		;end_set_faction_banner
		campaign_wait 0.1
		historic_event bd_ho_angmar_total_victory factions { normans, }
		campaign_wait 0.5
		historic_event bd_ho_angmar_total_victory_wk_intro factions { normans, }
		campaign_wait 0.5
		historic_event bd_ho_angmar_total_victory_wk_wights factions { normans, }
		campaign_wait 0.5
		set_event_counter witch_king_victory 1
		give_everything_to_faction portugal normans false
		;set_faction_banner
                ;faction normans
                ;banner united
		;end_set_faction_banner
		campaign_wait 0.1
		set_counter nazgula_timer 5
		set_event_counter WKcangotoBREE 0
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
				if I_CharacterExists z1
					kill_character z1
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r1
					kill_character nazgula_r1
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r2
					kill_character nazgula_r2
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r3
					kill_character nazgula_r3
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r4
					kill_character nazgula_r4
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r5
					kill_character nazgula_r5
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r6

;######################### HoW - Buzra-dum Quest ##########################
	if I_SettlementOwner South_Ered_Luin = normans					;BD Held by Bree	
	and I_EventCounter bree_mercenary = 1	
		
		if not I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1				;EL Good Outcome
			if I_CompareCounter bd_timer = 2				; 7
				historic_event bd_el_good factions { normans, }
			end_if

			if I_CompareCounter bd_timer = 3				; 12					
				historic_event bd_el_good_conclusion_start factions { normans, }
				historic_event bd_el_good_purchase_decision true factions { normans, }
			end_if

			if I_CompareCounter bd_timer = 4				; - 13
				if I_SettlementOwner South_Ered_Luin = normans					
					historic_event bd_el_good_conclusion_betrayal factions { normans, }
				end_if

				if I_SettlementOwner South_Ered_Luin = hungary
					historic_event bd_el_good_conclusion_purchase factions { normans, }
					add_money hungary -30000
					console_command add_money 30000
					set_event_counter bd_el_mercenary 1
					inc_counter bd_timer 1
				end_if
			end_if 
		end_if

		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1				;EL Evil Outcome
			if I_CompareCounter bd_timer = 2				; 7 - Direct or Hands-off Decision
				historic_event bd_approach_decision true factions { normans, }
			end_if

			if I_EventCounter direct_approach = 1				; 12 - Direct Stage 1
				if I_CompareCounter bd_timer = 3
					historic_event bd_direct_approach_gambit_warning factions { normans, }
					spawn_army
                				faction hungary
                				character	Thelor, named character, age 27, x 88, y 459, direction S, portrait Grindfarn, label thelor_1, battle_model ebony_guard
                				traits		DwarvenRace 1, Grimborn 1

                				unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                				unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
						unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

				end
		set_event_counter bd_kd_spawned 1
	end_if

	if I_EventCounter bd_kd_borug_only == 1
	and I_EventCounter bd_kd_spawned == 0
		spawn_army
					faction normans
					character	Borug, named character, age 28, x 414, y 477, direction S, portrait Borug, label borug_loyal
					traits		DwarvenRace 1, Longbeard 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                    			unit		Khazad-dum Guardians		exp 7 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1

					unit		Khazad-dum Reclaimers		exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1			
		end
		set_event_counter bd_kd_spawned 1
	end_if
end_monitor

;######################### Finale Home Preparation Choice ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_finale_home_prepare_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		historic_event bree_finale_home_prepare_delay factions { normans, }

and SettlementBuildingFinished = cathedral_o
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans

		terminate_monitor
end_monitor

        end_monitor

	end_monitor

	end_monitor

		set_event_counter bd_kd_borug_only 1
	end_monitor

		inc_counter bd_kd_behewan_relation 2
		set_event_counter bd_kd_long_war_behewan_hired_true 1

	and EventCounter = 1
		historic_event bd_kd_long_war_behewan_haggling_reject_high true factions { normans, }

		set_event_counter bd_kd_long_war_behewan_hired_true 1
	end_monitor

;######################### Behewan or Borug Skirmish ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_skirmish_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		spawn_army
                	faction slave
                	character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 89, y 352, family, direction E, label bd_skirmish
                	traits		OrcRace 1, GoodAmbusher 1, GoodCommander 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1

            	end
		campaign_wait 0.1
		console_command move_character Behewan 90,352
		engage_armies bd_skirmish, behewan_mercenary
		campaign_wait 3
		if I_CharacterExists behewan_mercenary
			historic_event bd_kd_long_war_skirmish_behewan factions { normans, }
			console_command move_character Behewan 417,481
			inc_counter bd_kd_behewan_relation 1
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_skirmish_declined
	and EventCounter = 1
		spawn_army
                	faction slave
                	character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 89, y 352, family, direction E, label bd_skirmish
                	traits		OrcRace 1, GoodAmbusher 1, GoodCommander 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                	unit		Warg Riders				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

                	unit		Goblin Infantry				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

                	unit		Goblin Archers				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

		engage_armies bd_skirmish, borug_mercenary
		campaign_wait 3
		if I_CharacterExists borug_mercenary
			historic_event bd_kd_long_war_skirmish_borug factions { normans, }
			console_command move_character Borug 414,477
		end_if
	end_monitor
;######################### Behewan or Borug Mining Operation ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_mining_operation_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		spawn_army
                	faction slave
                	character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 89, y 344, family, direction W, label bd_mining_1
                	traits		DwarvenRace 1, Longbeard 1, Disciplinarian 1, LogisticalSkill 2
                	unit		Iron Hills Mattocks			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                	unit		Iron Hills Mattocks			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                	unit		Iron Hills Mattocks			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
			unit		Dwarven Travellers			exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            	end
		campaign_wait 0.1
		console_command move_character Behewan 90,345
		engage_armies bd_mining_1, behewan_mercenary
		campaign_wait 3
		if I_CharacterExists behewan_mercenary
			historic_event bd_kd_long_war_mining_operation_aftermath_behewan_1 factions { normans, }
			campaign_wait 0.1
			historic_event bd_kd_long_war_mining_operation_aftermath_behewan_2 factions { normans, }
			console_command move_character Behewan 417,481
			set_event_counter bd_kd_long_war_final_battle_field 1
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_mining_operation_declined
	and EventCounter = 1
		inc_counter bd_kd_behewan_relation -1
		spawn_army
                	faction slave
                	character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 89, y 344, family, direction W, label bd_mining_1
                	traits		DwarvenRace 1, Longbeard 1, Disciplinarian 1, LogisticalSkill 2
                	unit		Broadbeam Marksmen			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                	unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

			unit		Dwarven Labourers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

            	end
		campaign_wait 0.1
		console_command move_character Borug 90,345
		engage_armies bd_mining_1, borug_mercenary
		campaign_wait 3
		if I_CharacterExists borug_mercenary
			historic_event bd_kd_long_war_mining_operation_aftermath_borug factions { normans, }
			console_command move_character Borug 414,477
			set_event_counter bd_kd_long_war_final_battle_tunnel 1
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_reinforcements_friends_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		replenish_units behewan_mercenary
	end_monitor
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_reinforcements_friends_declined
	and EventCounter = 1
		replenish_units borug_mercenary
	end_monitor
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_reinforcements_betrayal_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		replenish_units behewan_mercenary
	end_monitor
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_reinforcements_betrayal_declined
	and EventCounter = 1
		replenish_units borug_mercenary
	end_monitor
;######################### Behewan or Borug Upgrade ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bd_kd_long_war_upgrade_accepted
	and EventCounter = 1
		inc_counter bd_kd_behewan_relation 1
		create_unit behewan_mercenary, Enedwaith Cavalry, num 5, exp 3, arm 1, wep 1
		historic_event bd_kd_long_war_upgrade_behewan factions { normans, }
	end_monitor

	and EventCounter = 1
		create_unit borug_mercenary, Khazad-dum Guardians, num 2, exp 5, arm 3, wep 1
		create_unit borug_mercenary, Khazad-dum Reclaimers, num 1, exp 5, arm 3, wep 1
		historic_event bd_kd_long_war_upgrade_borug factions { normans, }
	end_monitor

	and EventCounter = 1

	and EventCounter = 1

	end_monitor
;######################### Bree-Enedwaith War Checker (Used for Lond Daer Quest Start) ##########################

	and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction teutonic_order = AtWar
        	set_event_counter bree_war_enedwaith 1
		set_event_counter bree_peace_enedwaith 0
	end_monitor

	and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction teutonic_order < AtWar
        	set_event_counter bree_war_enedwaith 0
		set_event_counter bree_peace_enedwaith 1
	end_monitor
;######################### Bree Expedition Good Ending ##########################

	and EventCounter = 1

		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled normans
            		terminate_monitor
        	end_if

            	campaign_wait 5

                	faction timurids

					unit		Bandits				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					unit		Bandits				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0				
				end

			spawn_army
					faction normans
					character	Vidar, named character, age 18, x 288, y 394, direction S, label norman_bandits_1
					traits		ElvenRace 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 3, 	LoyaltyStarter 1,  PietyStarter 1
					unit		Woodland Wardens		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Scouts			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0				
				end

			spawn_army
					faction normans
					character	Marec, named character, age 18, x 294, y 392, direction S, label norman_bandits_2
					traits		ElvenRace 1, Brave 2, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 3, 	LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
					unit		Woodland Spearmen		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Scouts			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Woodland Hunters		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Bandits				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Westron Catapult		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0				
				end
				spawn_army
                	faction timurids
			character	Theodand, named character, age 22, x 294, y 391, direction E, portrait Theodand, label theodand_betrayed_1
                traits		MiddleManRace 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                		unit		Skin-Changers			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				unit		Beorning Warriors		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Beorning Warriors		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Beorning Warriors		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Beorning Warriors		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Beorning Warriors		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Greenwood Foresters		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				unit		Greenwood Foresters		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Greenwood Foresters		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Greenwood Foresters		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0	
            		end
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Finish Bandit Lord off and rout the force (Theodand Route) ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bandit_lord_offer_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
			historic_event bandit_lord_offer_denied factions { normans, }
			inc_counter anduin_stage 1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Anduin quest start ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType anduin_offer_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
			inc_counter anduin_stage 1
			console_command add_money normans, 20000
			historic_event anduin_mercenary_accepted factions { normans, }
			zoom_strat_camera 0.5
			point_at_settlement Lower_Anduin_Vale
		    	move_strat_camera 289, 387
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Anduin quest early end trigger ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType anduin_offer_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
			historic_event anduin_mercenary_declined factions { normans, }
			inc_counter anduin_abandoned 1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Long troll decision ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_discovery_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
	and I_CompareCounter troll_stage = 2
			ui_flash_stop
			historic_event ettenmoors_later factions { normans, }
			inc_counter sage_stage 1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Short troll decision ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_discovery_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
	and I_CompareCounter troll_stage = 2
			ui_flash_stop
			historic_event ettenmoors_immediate true factions { normans, }
			inc_counter troll_stage 1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Merchant council end ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_morva_tarth_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
	and I_CompareCounter trolls_accepted = 0
			historic_event ettenmoors_merchant_council factions { normans, }
			inc_counter trolls_accepted 1
			console_command add_money 7500
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Sage start ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_morva_tarth_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
			historic_event ettenmoors_sage_start factions { normans, }
			inc_counter sage_stage 1
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Redhand bloodlust end ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_immediate_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
	and I_CompareCounter troll_stage = 3
			historic_event ettenmoors_blood factions { normans, }
			kill_character redhand_1
			spawn_army
                	faction normans
					character	Redhand, named character, battle_model Rhudaur_Huscarles, age 22, x 252, y 411, direction W, portrait Redhand, label redhand_2
                	traits		MiddleManRace 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2, GoodCommander 3, GoodAttacker 2, NightBattleCapable 1
                		unit		Trolls			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
				unit		Trolls			exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            		end	
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
;######################### Troll army end ##########################
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ettenmoors_immediate_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
	and I_CompareCounter troll_stage = 3
			historic_event ettenmoors_mobilization factions { normans, }
			spawn_army
                	faction normans
					character	random_name, named character, age 22, x 252, y 411, direction W
                	traits		MiddleManRace 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
				unit		Lumbermen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Breeland Militia	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Breeland Militia	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Archer Militia		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Archer Militia		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                		unit		Trolls			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Trolls			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            		end	
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor	
    ;#######################################################################################################################
    ;;;###### Dynamic Garrison Script: By Spice Master with help from Withwnar, adapted from original concept by TNZ #######
    ;#######################################################################################################################

    ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ;AI Test
    ;culture test

    ; 0 = northern_european
    ; 1 = southern_european
    ; 2 = greek
    ; 3 = middle_eastern
    ; 4 = eastern_european
    ; 5 = mesoamerican
    ; 6 = gondor
    ; 7 = turks
    declare_counter garrison_culture

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType northern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType southern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType greek
        set_counter garrison_culture 2
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType middle_eastern
        set_counter garrison_culture 3
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType eastern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 4
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionType aztecs
        set_counter garrison_culture 5
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionType teutonic_order
        set_counter garrison_culture 5
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType gondor
        set_counter garrison_culture 6
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionType turks
        set_counter garrison_culture 7
    end_monitor

    declare_counter core_Isenmouthe
    declare_counter core_Southern_Rhun
    declare_counter core_Centre_Rhovanion

    declare_counter core_Heorot
	declare_counter core_Withered
	declare_counter core_Far_Desert  
	declare_counter core_West_Wold  
	declare_counter core_Shire_West
	declare_counter core_Emyn_Beraid		
	declare_counter core_Scatha		


    ;Building Requirements    
	
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Scatha
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Scatha 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Scatha
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Scatha 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Scatha
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Scatha >= 1
            set_counter core_Scatha 0
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Adorn
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Adorn 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Adorn
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Adorn 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Adorn
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Adorn >= 1
            set_counter core_Adorn 0
        end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Far_Desert
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Far_Desert 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Far_Desert
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Far_Desert 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Far_Desert
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Far_Desert >= 1
            set_counter core_Far_Desert 0
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName West_Wold  
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_West_Wold 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName West_Wold  
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_West_Wold 2
    end_monitor

    end_monitor


    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Barad_Harn

    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Oiolad
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Oiolad 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Oiolad
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Oiolad >= 1
            set_counter core_Oiolad 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Woodsmen
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Woodsmen >= 1
            set_counter core_Woodsmen 0
        end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName West_Anduin
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_West_Anduin 1

    ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ;garrison creation

    declare_counter garrison
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Scatha_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Scatha
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Scatha = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Scatha = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor	
	
	
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Adorn_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Adorn
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Adorn = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Adorn = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Adorn "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Far_Desert_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Far_Desert
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Far_Desert = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if	
		
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Far_Desert = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Far_Desert "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor		
		
		
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf West_Wold_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege West_Wold
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_West_Wold = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if			
	
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_West_Wold = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit West_Wold "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Anfalas = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Anfalas "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7

            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

            end_if

                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Grey_Mountains = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Grey_Mountains "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Kelepar = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Kelepar "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7

            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Mithlond = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Elf Garrison" 4 3 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Mithlond "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Hollin "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Hollin "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Hollin "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Hollin "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Hollin "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Talsir_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Talsir
		
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
            console_command create_unit Talsir "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 3 1 1
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Talsir = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 2 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Talsir = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Northmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Dwarf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Elf Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Talsir "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

        if I_CompareCounter core_West_Mirkwood = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0

            end_if

                console_command create_unit Logathavuld "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if

            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

                console_command create_unit Pukel_Gap "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7

            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Wintirion "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Southern_Rhun "Harad Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Southern_Rhun "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Southern_Rhun "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Southern_Rhun "Gondor Garrison Elite" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Southern_Rhun "Dunedain Garrison" 3 5 1 1
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Centre_Rhovanion

    ;###### Dynamic Garrison Script: Return To Your Tasks! Destroy Garrison #######

    monitor_event PostBattle I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
		and not WasAttacker
		and WonBattle
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreBattleWithdrawal I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

declare_counter pu1_missile
declare_counter pu2_missile
declare_counter pu3_missile
declare_counter pu4_missile
declare_counter pu5_missile
declare_counter pu6_missile
declare_counter pu7_missile
declare_counter pu8_missile
declare_counter pu9_missile
declare_counter pu10_missile
declare_counter pu11_missile
declare_counter pu12_missile
declare_counter pu13_missile
declare_counter pu14_missile
declare_counter pu15_missile
declare_counter pu16_missile
declare_counter pu17_missile
declare_counter pu18_missile
declare_counter pu19_missile
declare_counter pu20_missile
declare_counter labels_set
declare_counter player_unit_count
declare_counter enemy_unit_count
declare_counter attacker_missile
declare_counter defender_missile
declare_counter protect_siege
declare_counter open_battle
declare_counter elephant_fix
declare_counter elephant_gate
declare_counter script_delay
declare_counter general_wait
declare_counter ob_under_fire
declare_counter ob_engaged
declare_counter control_union
declare_counter gates_destroyed
declare_counter player_breached
declare_counter ai_breached
declare_counter g5_special
declare_counter g5_special_2
declare_counter g5_special_3
declare_counter battle_start
declare_counter ha_fix
declare_counter panel_check
declare_counter rally_walls
declare_counter del_objective
declare_counter elephant_fix_check
declare_counter elephant_gate_tier2
declare_counter second_ring
declare_counter elephant_gate_tier3
declare_counter third_ring
declare_counter engage_enemy
declare_counter obj_set1
declare_counter obj_set0
declare_counter battle_looper


monitor_conditions I_InBattle
	inc_counter battle_looper 1
	if I_CompareCounter battle_looper = 100
		set_counter battle_looper 0
	end_if
end_monitor


monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed prebattle_fight_button

    ;;;;;;;
    set_counter labels_set 0
    set_counter player_unit_count 0
    set_counter enemy_unit_count 0
    set_counter open_battle 0
    set_counter engage_enemy 0
    set_counter player_breached 0
    set_counter ai_breached 0
    set_counter gates_destroyed 0
    ;;;;;;;
    set_counter pu1_missile 0
    set_counter pu2_missile 0
    set_counter pu3_missile 0
    set_counter pu4_missile 0
    set_counter pu5_missile 0
    set_counter pu6_missile 0
    set_counter pu7_missile 0
    set_counter pu8_missile 0
    set_counter pu9_missile 0
    set_counter pu10_missile 0
    set_counter pu11_missile 0
    set_counter pu12_missile 0
    set_counter pu13_missile 0
    set_counter pu14_missile 0
    set_counter pu15_missile 0
    set_counter pu16_missile 0
    set_counter pu17_missile 0
    set_counter pu18_missile 0
    set_counter pu19_missile 0
    set_counter pu20_missile 0
    set_counter script_delay 0
    ;;;;;;;Elephant Fix
    set_counter elephant_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_gate 0
    ;;;;;;;Protect General
    set_counter general_wait 0
    ;;;;;;;Open Battles
    set_counter ob_under_fire 0
    set_counter ob_engaged 0
    ;;;;;;;Special Ability
    set_counter g5_special 0
    set_counter g5_special_2 0
    set_counter g5_special_3 0
    set_counter ha_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_fix 0
    set_counter elephant_gate 0
    set_counter elephant_gate_tier2 0
    set_counter elephant_gate_tier3 0
    set_counter elephant_fix_check 0
    set_counter rally_walls 0
    set_counter second_ring 0
    set_counter third_ring 0
    set_counter del_objective 0
    set_counter obj_set1 0
    set_counter obj_set0 0
    prepare_for_battle

end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
and I_CompareCounter labels_set = 0

    battle_wait 0.1

    set_counter battle_start 1

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    log always ------------------------set labels-------------------------------------
    ;;;Army 1
    set_counter player_unit_count 0

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 0 0 0 a1u1
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
    label_unit 0 0 1 a1u2
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
    label_unit 0 0 2 a1u3
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 3
    label_unit 0 0 3 a1u4
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 4
    label_unit 0 0 4 a1u5
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 5
    label_unit 0 0 5 a1u6
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 6
    label_unit 0 0 6 a1u7
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 7
    label_unit 0 0 7 a1u8
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 8
    label_unit 0 0 8 a1u9
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 9
    label_unit 0 0 9 a1u10
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 10
    label_unit 0 0 10 a1u11
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 11
    label_unit 0 0 11 a1u12
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 12
    label_unit 0 0 12 a1u13
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 13
    label_unit 0 0 13 a1u14
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 14
    label_unit 0 0 14 a1u15
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 15
    label_unit 0 0 15 a1u16
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 16
    label_unit 0 0 16 a1u17
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 17
    label_unit 0 0 17 a1u18
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 18
    label_unit 0 0 18 a1u19
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 20
    label_unit 0 0 19 a1u20
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if

    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 3
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 4
    define_unit_group army1 a1u1 a1u2 a1u3 a1u4
    end_if
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 5

    end_if

    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits = 20

monitor_event BattleReinforcementsArrive ArmyIsLocal

    log always -------------------------- player reinforcements arrive--------------------------
    battle_wait 7
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute oathbreakers_unit > 0
        inc_counter oathbreaker_timer 1
    end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event BattleWallsCaptured TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter player_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - player breached-------------------------------------
    end_if

    if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter ai_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - ai breached-------------------------------------
    end_if
    
end_monitor

monitor_event BattleBattleGatesDestroyedByEngine TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle

    if not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter ai_breached 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - ai breached-------------------------------------
    end_if
    
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        set_counter gates_destroyed 1
        log always ------------------------ ai set - gates destroyed------------------------------------
    end_if
    
end_monitor


monitor_event BattlePlayerUnitAttacksEnemyUnit TrueCondition
and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    set_counter player_breached 1
    log always ------------------------ ai set - player breached-------------------------------------

end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter battle_looper = 40
and I_BattleStarted
and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    log always -------------------------ai defending---------------

    set_counter ob_engaged 0
    set_counter ob_under_fire 0
	if I_CompareCounter enemy_unit_count > 0
    if I_IsUnitUnderFire a2u1
    inc_counter ob_under_fire 2
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 fighting
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 pursuing
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if
    if I_UnitStatus a2u1 charging
    inc_counter ob_engaged 1
    end_if

		end_if
		if I_PercentageOfArmyKilled 1 0 > 7
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (> 7% army killed)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (> 7% army killed)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
            set_counter engage_enemy 1
		end_if
		if I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a2u1 220
		and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnitClass missile = 0
		and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitClass missile > 0
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (> enemy to many archers)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (> enemy to many archers)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
            set_counter engage_enemy 1
		end_if
		if I_BattleEnemyArmyPercentageOfUnitCategory cavalry > 60
		and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a2u1 350
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (> enemy to many cav units)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (> enemy to many cavakry)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
            set_counter engage_enemy 1
		end_if
	end_if
    if I_CompareCounter gates_destroyed = 0
    and I_CompareCounter player_breached = 0
    and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and not I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel = none
		if I_PercentageOfArmyKilled 1 0 > 12
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective DEFEND_LINE (> 20% army killed)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_FEATURE
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set DEFEND_FEATURE  (> 20% army killed)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
		end_if
    end_if
    if I_CompareCounter gates_destroyed > 0
    and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and not I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel = none
		if I_PercentageOfArmyKilled 1 0 > 12
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1

            ai_gta_plan_set 1 SALLY_OUT
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set SALLY_OUT  (> 20% army killed)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
		end_if
    end_if      
    if I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
        battle_wait 50
        if I_CompareCounter ob_under_fire > 0
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (under fire!)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL (under fire!)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter ob_engaged > 2
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (army engaged)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (army engaged)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
		end_if
		if I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a2u1 50
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_add_objective ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP (enemy close to general)-------------------------------------
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (enemy close to general)-------------------------------------
            ai_active_set on
		end_if
		if I_PercentageUnitKilled a2u1 > 10
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1

            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (> 10% general killed)-------------------------------------

            set_counter engage_enemy 1
		end_if
		if I_PercentageOfArmyKilled 1 0 > 7
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            set_counter obj_set1 1

            log always ------------------------ ai_gta_plan_set ATTACK_ALL  (> 7% army killed)-------------------------------------

		end_if
		if I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a2u1 220
		and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnitClass missile = 0
		and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnitClass missile > 0
            if I_CompareCounter obj_set1 = 1
                ai_gta_del_objective 1 0
            end_if
			ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
